06142                 duration = timer.getElapsedSeconds();
06143             }
06144             catch( TestFailureException& ) {
06145                 // This just means the test was aborted due to failure
06146             }
06147             catch(...) {
06148                 makeUnexpectedResultBuilder().useActiveException();
06149             }
06150             m_testCaseTracker->close();
06151             handleUnfinishedSections();
06152             m_messages.clear();
06153 
06154             Counts assertions = m_totals.assertions - prevAssertions;
06155             bool missingAssertions = testForMissingAssertions( assertions );
06156 
06157             if( testCaseInfo.okToFail() ) {
06158                 std::swap( assertions.failedButOk, assertions.failed );
06159                 m_totals.assertions.failed -= assertions.failedButOk;
06160                 m_totals.assertions.failedButOk += assertions.failedButOk;
06161             }
06162 
06163             SectionStats testCaseSectionStats( testCaseSection, assertions, duration, missingAssertions );
06164             m_reporter->sectionEnded( testCaseSectionStats );
06165         }
06166 
06167         void invokeActiveTestCase() {
06168             FatalConditionHandler fatalConditionHandler; // Handle signals
06169             m_activeTestCase->invoke();
06170             fatalConditionHandler.reset();
06171         }
06172 
06173     private:
06174 
06175         ResultBuilder makeUnexpectedResultBuilder() const {
06176             return ResultBuilder(   m_lastAssertionInfo.macroName.c_str(),
06177                                     m_lastAssertionInfo.lineInfo,
06178                                     m_lastAssertionInfo.capturedExpression.c_str(),
06179                                     m_lastAssertionInfo.resultDisposition );
06180         }
06181 
06182         void handleUnfinishedSections() {
06183             // If sections ended prematurely due to an exception we stored their
06184             // infos here so we can tear them down outside the unwind process.
06185             for( std::vector<SectionEndInfo>::const_reverse_iterator it = m_unfinishedSections.rbegin(),
06186                         itEnd = m_unfinishedSections.rend();
06187                     it != itEnd;
06188                     ++it )
06189                 sectionEnded( *it );
06190             m_unfinishedSections.clear();
06191         }
06192 
06193         TestRunInfo m_runInfo;
06194         IMutableContext& m_context;
06195         TestCase const* m_activeTestCase;
06196         ITracker* m_testCaseTracker;
06197         ITracker* m_currentSectionTracker;
06198         AssertionResult m_lastResult;
06199 
06200         Ptr<IConfig const> m_config;
06201         Totals m_totals;
06202         Ptr<IStreamingReporter> m_reporter;
06203         std::vector<MessageInfo> m_messages;
06204         AssertionInfo m_lastAssertionInfo;
06205         std::vector<SectionEndInfo> m_unfinishedSections;
06206         std::vector<ITracker*> m_activeSections;
06207         TrackerContext m_trackerContext;
06208     };
06209 
06210     IResultCapture& getResultCapture() {
06211         if( IResultCapture* capture = getCurrentContext().getResultCapture() )
06212             return *capture;
06213         else
06214             throw std::logic_error( "No result capture instance" );
06215     }
06216 
06217 } // end namespace Catch
06218 
06219 // #included from: internal/catch_version.h
06220 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_VERSION_H_INCLUDED
06221 
06222 namespace Catch {
06223 
06224     // Versioning information
06225     struct Version {
06226         Version(    unsigned int _majorVersion,
06227                     unsigned int _minorVersion,
06228                     unsigned int _patchNumber,
06229                     std::string const& _branchName,
06230                     unsigned int _buildNumber );
06231 
06232         unsigned int const majorVersion;
06233         unsigned int const minorVersion;
06234         unsigned int const patchNumber;
06235 
06236         // buildNumber is only used if branchName is not null
06237         std::string const branchName;
06238         unsigned int const buildNumber;
06239 
06240         friend std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, Version const& version );
06241 
06242     private:
06243         void operator=( Version const& );
06244     };
06245 
06246     extern Version libraryVersion;
06247 }
06248 
06249 #include <fstream>
06250 #include <stdlib.h>
06251 #include <limits>
06252 
06253 namespace Catch {
06254 
06255     Ptr<IStreamingReporter> createReporter( std::string const& reporterName, Ptr<Config> const& config ) {
06256         Ptr<IStreamingReporter> reporter = getRegistryHub().getReporterRegistry().create( reporterName, config.get() );
06257         if( !reporter ) {
06258             std::ostringstream oss;
06259             oss << "No reporter registered with name: '" << reporterName << "'";
06260             throw std::domain_error( oss.str() );
06261         }
06262         return reporter;
06263     }
06264 
06265     Ptr<IStreamingReporter> makeReporter( Ptr<Config> const& config ) {
06266         std::vector<std::string> reporters = config->getReporterNames();
06267         if( reporters.empty() )
06268             reporters.push_back( "console" );
06269 
06270         Ptr<IStreamingReporter> reporter;
06271         for( std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = reporters.begin(), itEnd = reporters.end();
06272                 it != itEnd;
06273                 ++it )
06274             reporter = addReporter( reporter, createReporter( *it, config ) );
06275         return reporter;
06276     }
06277     Ptr<IStreamingReporter> addListeners( Ptr<IConfig const> const& config, Ptr<IStreamingReporter> reporters ) {
06278         IReporterRegistry::Listeners listeners = getRegistryHub().getReporterRegistry().getListeners();
06279         for( IReporterRegistry::Listeners::const_iterator it = listeners.begin(), itEnd = listeners.end();
06280                 it != itEnd;
06281                 ++it )
06282             reporters = addReporter(reporters, (*it)->create( ReporterConfig( config ) ) );
06283         return reporters;
06284     }
06285 
06286     Totals runTests( Ptr<Config> const& config ) {
06287 
06288         Ptr<IConfig const> iconfig = config.get();
06289 
06290         Ptr<IStreamingReporter> reporter = makeReporter( config );
06291         reporter = addListeners( iconfig, reporter );
06292 
06293         RunContext context( iconfig, reporter );
06294 
06295         Totals totals;
06296 
06297         context.testGroupStarting( config->name(), 1, 1 );
06298 
06299         TestSpec testSpec = config->testSpec();
06300         if( !testSpec.hasFilters() )
06301             testSpec = TestSpecParser( ITagAliasRegistry::get() ).parse( "~[.]" ).testSpec(); // All not hidden tests
06302 
06303         std::vector<TestCase> const& allTestCases = getAllTestCasesSorted( *iconfig );
06304         for( std::vector<TestCase>::const_iterator it = allTestCases.begin(), itEnd = allTestCases.end();
06305                 it != itEnd;
06306                 ++it ) {
06307             if( !context.aborting() && matchTest( *it, testSpec, *iconfig ) )
06308                 totals += context.runTest( *it );
06309             else
06310                 reporter->skipTest( *it );
06311         }
06312 
06313         context.testGroupEnded( iconfig->name(), totals, 1, 1 );
06314         return totals;
06315     }
06316 
06317     void applyFilenamesAsTags( IConfig const& config ) {
06318         std::vector<TestCase> const& tests = getAllTestCasesSorted( config );
06319         for(std::size_t i = 0; i < tests.size(); ++i ) {
06320             TestCase& test = const_cast<TestCase&>( tests[i] );
06321             std::set<std::string> tags = test.tags;
06322 
06323             std::string filename = test.lineInfo.file;
06324             std::string::size_type lastSlash = filename.find_last_of( "\\/" );
06325             if( lastSlash != std::string::npos )
06326                 filename = filename.substr( lastSlash+1 );
06327 
06328             std::string::size_type lastDot = filename.find_last_of( "." );
06329             if( lastDot != std::string::npos )
06330                 filename = filename.substr( 0, lastDot );
06331 
06332             tags.insert( "#" + filename );
06333             setTags( test, tags );
06334         }
06335     }
06336 
06337     class Session : NonCopyable {
06338         static bool alreadyInstantiated;
06339 
06340     public:
06341 
06342         struct OnUnusedOptions { enum DoWhat { Ignore, Fail }; };
06343 
06344         Session()
06345         : m_cli( makeCommandLineParser() ) {
06346             if( alreadyInstantiated ) {
06347                 std::string msg = "Only one instance of Catch::Session can ever be used";
06348                 Catch::cerr() << msg << std::endl;
06349                 throw std::logic_error( msg );
06350             }
06351             alreadyInstantiated = true;
06352         }
06353         ~Session() {
06354             Catch::cleanUp();
06355         }
06356 
06357         void showHelp( std::string const& processName ) {
06358             Catch::cout() << "\nCatch v" << libraryVersion << "\n";
06359 
06360             m_cli.usage( Catch::cout(), processName );
06361             Catch::cout() << "For more detail usage please see the project docs\n" << std::endl;
06362         }
06363 
06364         int applyCommandLine( int argc, char const* const* const argv, OnUnusedOptions::DoWhat unusedOptionBehaviour = OnUnusedOptions::Fail ) {
06365             try {
06366                 m_cli.setThrowOnUnrecognisedTokens( unusedOptionBehaviour == OnUnusedOptions::Fail );
06367                 m_unusedTokens = m_cli.parseInto( Clara::argsToVector( argc, argv ), m_configData );
06368                 if( m_configData.showHelp )
06369                     showHelp( m_configData.processName );
06370                 m_config.reset();
06371             }
06372             catch( std::exception& ex ) {
06373                 {
06374                     Colour colourGuard( Colour::Red );
06375                     Catch::cerr()
06376                         << "\nError(s) in input:\n"
06377                         << Text( ex.what(), TextAttributes().setIndent(2) )
06378                         << "\n\n";
06379                 }
06380                 m_cli.usage( Catch::cout(), m_configData.processName );
06381                 return (std::numeric_limits<int>::max)();
06382             }
06383             return 0;
06384         }
06385 
06386         void useConfigData( ConfigData const& _configData ) {
06387             m_configData = _configData;
06388             m_config.reset();
06389         }
06390 
06391         int run( int argc, char const* const* const argv ) {
06392 
06393             int returnCode = applyCommandLine( argc, argv );
06394             if( returnCode == 0 )
06395                 returnCode = run();
06396             return returnCode;
06397         }
06398 
06399         int run() {
06400             if( m_configData.showHelp )
06401                 return 0;
06402 
06403             try
06404             {
06405                 config(); // Force config to be constructed
06406 
06407                 seedRng( *m_config );
06408 
06409                 if( m_configData.filenamesAsTags )
06410                     applyFilenamesAsTags( *m_config );
06411 
06412                 // Handle list request
06413                 if( Option<std::size_t> listed = list( config() ) )
06414                     return static_cast<int>( *listed );
06415 
06416                 return static_cast<int>( runTests( m_config ).assertions.failed );
06417             }
06418             catch( std::exception& ex ) {
06419                 Catch::cerr() << ex.what() << std::endl;
06420                 return (std::numeric_limits<int>::max)();
06421             }
06422         }
06423 
06424         Clara::CommandLine<ConfigData> const& cli() const {
06425             return m_cli;
06426         }
06427         std::vector<Clara::Parser::Token> const& unusedTokens() const {
06428             return m_unusedTokens;
06429         }
06430         ConfigData& configData() {
06431             return m_configData;
06432         }
06433         Config& config() {
06434             if( !m_config )
06435                 m_config = new Config( m_configData );
06436             return *m_config;
06437         }
06438     private:
06439         Clara::CommandLine<ConfigData> m_cli;
06440         std::vector<Clara::Parser::Token> m_unusedTokens;
06441         ConfigData m_configData;
06442         Ptr<Config> m_config;
06443     };
06444 
06445     bool Session::alreadyInstantiated = false;
06446 
06447 } // end namespace Catch
06448 
06449 // #included from: catch_registry_hub.hpp
06450 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REGISTRY_HUB_HPP_INCLUDED
06451 
06452 // #included from: catch_test_case_registry_impl.hpp
06453 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_TEST_CASE_REGISTRY_IMPL_HPP_INCLUDED
06454 
06455 #include <vector>
06456 #include <set>
06457 #include <sstream>
06458 #include <iostream>
06459 #include <algorithm>
06460 
06461 #ifdef CATCH_CPP14_OR_GREATER
06462 #include <random>
06463 #endif
06464 
06465 namespace Catch {
06466 
06467     struct RandomNumberGenerator {
06468         typedef std::ptrdiff_t result_type;
06469 
06470         result_type operator()( result_type n ) const { return std::rand() % n; }
06471 
06472 #ifdef CATCH_CPP14_OR_GREATER
06473         static constexpr result_type min() { return 0; }
06474         static constexpr result_type max() { return 1000000; }
06475         result_type operator()() const { return std::rand() % max(); }
06476 #endif
06477         template<typename V>
06478         static void shuffle( V& vector ) {
06479             RandomNumberGenerator rng;
06480 #ifdef CATCH_CPP14_OR_GREATER
06481             std::shuffle( vector.begin(), vector.end(), rng );
06482 #else
06483             std::random_shuffle( vector.begin(), vector.end(), rng );
06484 #endif
06485         }
06486     };
06487 
06488     inline std::vector<TestCase> sortTests( IConfig const& config, std::vector<TestCase> const& unsortedTestCases ) {
06489 
06490         std::vector<TestCase> sorted = unsortedTestCases;
06491 
06492         switch( config.runOrder() ) {
06493             case RunTests::InLexicographicalOrder:
06494                 std::sort( sorted.begin(), sorted.end() );
06495                 break;
06496             case RunTests::InRandomOrder:
06497                 {
06498                     seedRng( config );
06499                     RandomNumberGenerator::shuffle( sorted );
06500                 }
06501                 break;
06502             case RunTests::InDeclarationOrder:
06503                 // already in declaration order
06504                 break;
06505         }
06506         return sorted;
06507     }
06508     bool matchTest( TestCase const& testCase, TestSpec const& testSpec, IConfig const& config ) {
06509         return testSpec.matches( testCase ) && ( config.allowThrows() || !testCase.throws() );
06510     }
06511 
06512     void enforceNoDuplicateTestCases( std::vector<TestCase> const& functions ) {
06513         std::set<TestCase> seenFunctions;
06514         for( std::vector<TestCase>::const_iterator it = functions.begin(), itEnd = functions.end();
06515             it != itEnd;
06516             ++it ) {
06517             std::pair<std::set<TestCase>::const_iterator, bool> prev = seenFunctions.insert( *it );
06518             if( !prev.second ) {
06519                 std::ostringstream ss;
06520 
06521                 ss  << Colour( Colour::Red )
06522                     << "error: TEST_CASE( \"" << it->name << "\" ) already defined.\n"
06523                     << "\tFirst seen at " << prev.first->getTestCaseInfo().lineInfo << "\n"
06524                     << "\tRedefined at " << it->getTestCaseInfo().lineInfo << std::endl;
06525 
06526                 throw std::runtime_error(ss.str());
06527             }
06528         }
06529     }
06530 
06531     std::vector<TestCase> filterTests( std::vector<TestCase> const& testCases, TestSpec const& testSpec, IConfig const& config ) {
06532         std::vector<TestCase> filtered;
06533         filtered.reserve( testCases.size() );
06534         for( std::vector<TestCase>::const_iterator it = testCases.begin(), itEnd = testCases.end();
06535                 it != itEnd;
06536                 ++it )
06537             if( matchTest( *it, testSpec, config ) )
06538                 filtered.push_back( *it );
06539         return filtered;
06540     }
06541     std::vector<TestCase> const& getAllTestCasesSorted( IConfig const& config ) {
06542         return getRegistryHub().getTestCaseRegistry().getAllTestsSorted( config );
06543     }
06544 
06545     class TestRegistry : public ITestCaseRegistry {
06546     public:
06547         TestRegistry()
06548         :   m_currentSortOrder( RunTests::InDeclarationOrder ),
06549             m_unnamedCount( 0 )
06550         {}
06551         virtual ~TestRegistry();
06552 
06553         virtual void registerTest( TestCase const& testCase ) {
06554             std::string name = testCase.getTestCaseInfo().name;
06555             if( name == "" ) {
06556                 std::ostringstream oss;
06557                 oss << "Anonymous test case " << ++m_unnamedCount;
06558                 return registerTest( testCase.withName( oss.str() ) );
06559             }
06560             m_functions.push_back( testCase );
06561         }
06562 
06563         virtual std::vector<TestCase> const& getAllTests() const {
06564             return m_functions;
06565         }
06566         virtual std::vector<TestCase> const& getAllTestsSorted( IConfig const& config ) const {
06567             if( m_sortedFunctions.empty() )
06568                 enforceNoDuplicateTestCases( m_functions );
06569 
06570             if(  m_currentSortOrder != config.runOrder() || m_sortedFunctions.empty() ) {
06571                 m_sortedFunctions = sortTests( config, m_functions );
06572                 m_currentSortOrder = config.runOrder();
06573             }
06574             return m_sortedFunctions;
06575         }
06576 
06577     private:
06578         std::vector<TestCase> m_functions;
06579         mutable RunTests::InWhatOrder m_currentSortOrder;
06580         mutable std::vector<TestCase> m_sortedFunctions;
06581         size_t m_unnamedCount;
06582         std::ios_base::Init m_ostreamInit; // Forces cout/ cerr to be initialised
06583     };
06584 
06586 
06587     class FreeFunctionTestCase : public SharedImpl<ITestCase> {
06588     public:
06589 
06590         FreeFunctionTestCase( TestFunction fun ) : m_fun( fun ) {}
06591 
06592         virtual void invoke() const {
06593             m_fun();
06594         }
06595 
06596     private:
06597         virtual ~FreeFunctionTestCase();
06598 
06599         TestFunction m_fun;
06600     };
06601 
06602     inline std::string extractClassName( std::string const& classOrQualifiedMethodName ) {
06603         std::string className = classOrQualifiedMethodName;
06604         if( startsWith( className, "&" ) )
06605         {
06606             std::size_t lastColons = className.rfind( "::" );
06607             std::size_t penultimateColons = className.rfind( "::", lastColons-1 );
06608             if( penultimateColons == std::string::npos )
06609                 penultimateColons = 1;
06610             className = className.substr( penultimateColons, lastColons-penultimateColons );
06611         }
06612         return className;
06613     }
06614 
06615     void registerTestCase
06616         (   ITestCase* testCase,
06617             char const* classOrQualifiedMethodName,
06618             NameAndDesc const& nameAndDesc,
06619             SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo ) {
06620 
06621         getMutableRegistryHub().registerTest
06622             ( makeTestCase
06623                 (   testCase,
06624                     extractClassName( classOrQualifiedMethodName ),
06625                     nameAndDesc.name,
06626                     nameAndDesc.description,
06627                     lineInfo ) );
06628     }
06629     void registerTestCaseFunction
06630         (   TestFunction function,
06631             SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo,
06632             NameAndDesc const& nameAndDesc ) {
06633         registerTestCase( new FreeFunctionTestCase( function ), "", nameAndDesc, lineInfo );
06634     }
06635 
06637 
06638     AutoReg::AutoReg
06639         (   TestFunction function,
06640             SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo,
06641             NameAndDesc const& nameAndDesc ) {
06642         registerTestCaseFunction( function, lineInfo, nameAndDesc );
06643     }
06644 
06645     AutoReg::~AutoReg() {}
06646 
06647 } // end namespace Catch
06648 
06649 // #included from: catch_reporter_registry.hpp
06650 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_REGISTRY_HPP_INCLUDED
06651 
06652 #include <map>
06653 
06654 namespace Catch {
06655 
06656     class ReporterRegistry : public IReporterRegistry {
06657 
06658     public:
06659 
06660         virtual ~ReporterRegistry() CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
06661 
06662         virtual IStreamingReporter* create( std::string const& name, Ptr<IConfig const> const& config ) const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06663             FactoryMap::const_iterator it =  m_factories.find( name );
06664             if( it == m_factories.end() )
06665                 return CATCH_NULL;
06666             return it->second->create( ReporterConfig( config ) );
06667         }
06668 
06669         void registerReporter( std::string const& name, Ptr<IReporterFactory> const& factory ) {
06670             m_factories.insert( std::make_pair( name, factory ) );
06671         }
06672         void registerListener( Ptr<IReporterFactory> const& factory ) {
06673             m_listeners.push_back( factory );
06674         }
06675 
06676         virtual FactoryMap const& getFactories() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06677             return m_factories;
06678         }
06679         virtual Listeners const& getListeners() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06680             return m_listeners;
06681         }
06682 
06683     private:
06684         FactoryMap m_factories;
06685         Listeners m_listeners;
06686     };
06687 }
06688 
06689 // #included from: catch_exception_translator_registry.hpp
06690 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_EXCEPTION_TRANSLATOR_REGISTRY_HPP_INCLUDED
06691 
06692 #ifdef __OBJC__
06693 #import "Foundation/Foundation.h"
06694 #endif
06695 
06696 namespace Catch {
06697 
06698     class ExceptionTranslatorRegistry : public IExceptionTranslatorRegistry {
06699     public:
06700         ~ExceptionTranslatorRegistry() {
06701             deleteAll( m_translators );
06702         }
06703 
06704         virtual void registerTranslator( const IExceptionTranslator* translator ) {
06705             m_translators.push_back( translator );
06706         }
06707 
06708         virtual std::string translateActiveException() const {
06709             try {
06710 #ifdef __OBJC__
06711                 // In Objective-C try objective-c exceptions first
06712                 @try {
06713                     return tryTranslators();
06714                 }
06715                 @catch (NSException *exception) {
06716                     return Catch::toString( [exception description] );
06717                 }
06718 #else
06719                 return tryTranslators();
06720 #endif
06721             }
06722             catch( TestFailureException& ) {
06723                 throw;
06724             }
06725             catch( std::exception& ex ) {
06726                 return ex.what();
06727             }
06728             catch( std::string& msg ) {
06729                 return msg;
06730             }
06731             catch( const char* msg ) {
06732                 return msg;
06733             }
06734             catch(...) {
06735                 return "Unknown exception";
06736             }
06737         }
06738 
06739         std::string tryTranslators() const {
06740             if( m_translators.empty() )
06741                 throw;
06742             else
06743                 return m_translators[0]->translate( m_translators.begin()+1, m_translators.end() );
06744         }
06745 
06746     private:
06747         std::vector<const IExceptionTranslator*> m_translators;
06748     };
06749 }
06750 
06751 namespace Catch {
06752 
06753     namespace {
06754 
06755         class RegistryHub : public IRegistryHub, public IMutableRegistryHub {
06756 
06757             RegistryHub( RegistryHub const& );
06758             void operator=( RegistryHub const& );
06759 
06760         public: // IRegistryHub
06761             RegistryHub() {
06762             }
06763             virtual IReporterRegistry const& getReporterRegistry() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06764                 return m_reporterRegistry;
06765             }
06766             virtual ITestCaseRegistry const& getTestCaseRegistry() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06767                 return m_testCaseRegistry;
06768             }
06769             virtual IExceptionTranslatorRegistry& getExceptionTranslatorRegistry() CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06770                 return m_exceptionTranslatorRegistry;
06771             }
06772 
06773         public: // IMutableRegistryHub
06774             virtual void registerReporter( std::string const& name, Ptr<IReporterFactory> const& factory ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06775                 m_reporterRegistry.registerReporter( name, factory );
06776             }
06777             virtual void registerListener( Ptr<IReporterFactory> const& factory ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06778                 m_reporterRegistry.registerListener( factory );
06779             }
06780             virtual void registerTest( TestCase const& testInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06781                 m_testCaseRegistry.registerTest( testInfo );
06782             }
06783             virtual void registerTranslator( const IExceptionTranslator* translator ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
06784                 m_exceptionTranslatorRegistry.registerTranslator( translator );
06785             }
06786 
06787         private:
06788             TestRegistry m_testCaseRegistry;
06789             ReporterRegistry m_reporterRegistry;
06790             ExceptionTranslatorRegistry m_exceptionTranslatorRegistry;
06791         };
06792 
06793         // Single, global, instance
06794         inline RegistryHub*& getTheRegistryHub() {
06795             static RegistryHub* theRegistryHub = CATCH_NULL;
06796             if( !theRegistryHub )
06797                 theRegistryHub = new RegistryHub();
06798             return theRegistryHub;
06799         }
06800     }
06801 
06802     IRegistryHub& getRegistryHub() {
06803         return *getTheRegistryHub();
06804     }
06805     IMutableRegistryHub& getMutableRegistryHub() {
06806         return *getTheRegistryHub();
06807     }
06808     void cleanUp() {
06809         delete getTheRegistryHub();
06810         getTheRegistryHub() = CATCH_NULL;
06811         cleanUpContext();
06812     }
06813     std::string translateActiveException() {
06814         return getRegistryHub().getExceptionTranslatorRegistry().translateActiveException();
06815     }
06816 
06817 } // end namespace Catch
06818 
06819 // #included from: catch_notimplemented_exception.hpp
06820 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_NOTIMPLEMENTED_EXCEPTION_HPP_INCLUDED
06821 
06822 #include <ostream>
06823 
06824 namespace Catch {
06825 
06826     NotImplementedException::NotImplementedException( SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo )
06827     :   m_lineInfo( lineInfo ) {
06828         std::ostringstream oss;
06829         oss << lineInfo << ": function ";
06830         oss << "not implemented";
06831         m_what = oss.str();
06832     }
06833 
06834     const char* NotImplementedException::what() const CATCH_NOEXCEPT {
06835         return m_what.c_str();
06836     }
06837 
06838 } // end namespace Catch
06839 
06840 // #included from: catch_context_impl.hpp
06841 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_CONTEXT_IMPL_HPP_INCLUDED
06842 
06843 // #included from: catch_stream.hpp
06844 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_STREAM_HPP_INCLUDED
06845 
06846 #include <stdexcept>
06847 #include <cstdio>
06848 #include <iostream>
06849 
06850 namespace Catch {
06851 
06852     template<typename WriterF, size_t bufferSize=256>
06853     class StreamBufImpl : public StreamBufBase {
06854         char data[bufferSize];
06855         WriterF m_writer;
06856 
06857     public:
06858         StreamBufImpl() {
06859             setp( data, data + sizeof(data) );
06860         }
06861 
06862         ~StreamBufImpl() CATCH_NOEXCEPT {
06863             sync();
06864         }
06865 
06866     private:
06867         int overflow( int c ) {
06868             sync();
06869 
06870             if( c != EOF ) {
06871                 if( pbase() == epptr() )
06872                     m_writer( std::string( 1, static_cast<char>( c ) ) );
06873                 else
06874                     sputc( static_cast<char>( c ) );
06875             }
06876             return 0;
06877         }
06878 
06879         int sync() {
06880             if( pbase() != pptr() ) {
06881                 m_writer( std::string( pbase(), static_cast<std::string::size_type>( pptr() - pbase() ) ) );
06882                 setp( pbase(), epptr() );
06883             }
06884             return 0;
06885         }
06886     };
06887 
06889 
06890     FileStream::FileStream( std::string const& filename ) {
06891         m_ofs.open( filename.c_str() );
06892         if( m_ofs.fail() ) {
06893             std::ostringstream oss;
06894             oss << "Unable to open file: '" << filename << "'";
06895             throw std::domain_error( oss.str() );
06896         }
06897     }
06898 
06899     std::ostream& FileStream::stream() const {
06900         return m_ofs;
06901     }
06902 
06903     struct OutputDebugWriter {
06904 
06905         void operator()( std::string const&str ) {
06906             writeToDebugConsole( str );
06907         }
06908     };
06909 
06910     DebugOutStream::DebugOutStream()
06911     :   m_streamBuf( new StreamBufImpl<OutputDebugWriter>() ),
06912         m_os( m_streamBuf.get() )
06913     {}
06914 
06915     std::ostream& DebugOutStream::stream() const {
06916         return m_os;
06917     }
06918 
06919     // Store the streambuf from cout up-front because
06920     // cout may get redirected when running tests
06921     CoutStream::CoutStream()
06922     :   m_os( Catch::cout().rdbuf() )
06923     {}
06924 
06925     std::ostream& CoutStream::stream() const {
06926         return m_os;
06927     }
06928 
06929 #ifndef CATCH_CONFIG_NOSTDOUT // If you #define this you must implement these functions
06930     std::ostream& cout() {
06931         return std::cout;
06932     }
06933     std::ostream& cerr() {
06934         return std::cerr;
06935     }
06936 #endif
06937 }
06938 
06939 namespace Catch {
06940 
06941     class Context : public IMutableContext {
06942 
06943         Context() : m_config( CATCH_NULL ), m_runner( CATCH_NULL ), m_resultCapture( CATCH_NULL ) {}
06944         Context( Context const& );
06945         void operator=( Context const& );
06946 
06947     public: // IContext
06948         virtual IResultCapture* getResultCapture() {
06949             return m_resultCapture;
06950         }
06951         virtual IRunner* getRunner() {
06952             return m_runner;
06953         }
06954         virtual size_t getGeneratorIndex( std::string const& fileInfo, size_t totalSize ) {
06955             return getGeneratorsForCurrentTest()
06956             .getGeneratorInfo( fileInfo, totalSize )
06957             .getCurrentIndex();
06958         }
06959         virtual bool advanceGeneratorsForCurrentTest() {
06960             IGeneratorsForTest* generators = findGeneratorsForCurrentTest();
06961             return generators && generators->moveNext();
06962         }
06963 
06964         virtual Ptr<IConfig const> getConfig() const {
06965             return m_config;
06966         }
06967 
06968     public: // IMutableContext
06969         virtual void setResultCapture( IResultCapture* resultCapture ) {
06970             m_resultCapture = resultCapture;
06971         }
06972         virtual void setRunner( IRunner* runner ) {
06973             m_runner = runner;
06974         }
06975         virtual void setConfig( Ptr<IConfig const> const& config ) {
06976             m_config = config;
06977         }
06978 
06979         friend IMutableContext& getCurrentMutableContext();
06980 
06981     private:
06982         IGeneratorsForTest* findGeneratorsForCurrentTest() {
06983             std::string testName = getResultCapture()->getCurrentTestName();
06984 
06985             std::map<std::string, IGeneratorsForTest*>::const_iterator it =
06986                 m_generatorsByTestName.find( testName );
06987             return it != m_generatorsByTestName.end()
06988                 ? it->second
06989                 : CATCH_NULL;
06990         }
06991 
06992         IGeneratorsForTest& getGeneratorsForCurrentTest() {
06993             IGeneratorsForTest* generators = findGeneratorsForCurrentTest();
06994             if( !generators ) {
06995                 std::string testName = getResultCapture()->getCurrentTestName();
06996                 generators = createGeneratorsForTest();
06997                 m_generatorsByTestName.insert( std::make_pair( testName, generators ) );
06998             }
06999             return *generators;
07000         }
07001 
07002     private:
07003         Ptr<IConfig const> m_config;
07004         IRunner* m_runner;
07005         IResultCapture* m_resultCapture;
07006         std::map<std::string, IGeneratorsForTest*> m_generatorsByTestName;
07007     };
07008 
07009     namespace {
07010         Context* currentContext = CATCH_NULL;
07011     }
07012     IMutableContext& getCurrentMutableContext() {
07013         if( !currentContext )
07014             currentContext = new Context();
07015         return *currentContext;
07016     }
07017     IContext& getCurrentContext() {
07018         return getCurrentMutableContext();
07019     }
07020 
07021     void cleanUpContext() {
07022         delete currentContext;
07023         currentContext = CATCH_NULL;
07024     }
07025 }
07026 
07027 // #included from: catch_console_colour_impl.hpp
07028 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_CONSOLE_COLOUR_IMPL_HPP_INCLUDED
07029 
07030 namespace Catch {
07031     namespace {
07032 
07033         struct IColourImpl {
07034             virtual ~IColourImpl() {}
07035             virtual void use( Colour::Code _colourCode ) = 0;
07036         };
07037 
07038         struct NoColourImpl : IColourImpl {
07039             void use( Colour::Code ) {}
07040 
07041             static IColourImpl* instance() {
07042                 static NoColourImpl s_instance;
07043                 return &s_instance;
07044             }
07045         };
07046 
07047     } // anon namespace
07048 } // namespace Catch
07049 
07050 #if !defined( CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_NONE ) && !defined( CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_WINDOWS ) && !defined( CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_ANSI )
07051 #   ifdef CATCH_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
07052 #       define CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_WINDOWS
07053 #   else
07054 #       define CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_ANSI
07055 #   endif
07056 #endif
07057 
07058 #if defined ( CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_WINDOWS ) /////////////////////////////////////////
07059 
07060 #ifndef NOMINMAX
07061 #define NOMINMAX
07062 #endif
07063 
07064 #ifdef __AFXDLL
07065 #include <AfxWin.h>
07066 #else
07067 #include <windows.h>
07068 #endif
07069 
07070 namespace Catch {
07071 namespace {
07072 
07073     class Win32ColourImpl : public IColourImpl {
07074     public:
07075         Win32ColourImpl() : stdoutHandle( GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE) )
07076         {
07077             CONSOLE_SCREEN_BUFFER_INFO csbiInfo;
07078             GetConsoleScreenBufferInfo( stdoutHandle, &csbiInfo );
07079             originalForegroundAttributes = csbiInfo.wAttributes & ~( BACKGROUND_GREEN | BACKGROUND_RED | BACKGROUND_BLUE | BACKGROUND_INTENSITY );
07080             originalBackgroundAttributes = csbiInfo.wAttributes & ~( FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_BLUE | FOREGROUND_INTENSITY );
07081         }
07082 
07083         virtual void use( Colour::Code _colourCode ) {
07084             switch( _colourCode ) {
07085                 case Colour::None:      return setTextAttribute( originalForegroundAttributes );
07086                 case Colour::White:     return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_BLUE );
07087                 case Colour::Red:       return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_RED );
07088                 case Colour::Green:     return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_GREEN );
07089                 case Colour::Blue:      return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_BLUE );
07090                 case Colour::Cyan:      return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_BLUE | FOREGROUND_GREEN );
07091                 case Colour::Yellow:    return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_GREEN );
07092                 case Colour::Grey:      return setTextAttribute( 0 );
07093 
07094                 case Colour::LightGrey:     return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_INTENSITY );
07095                 case Colour::BrightRed:     return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | FOREGROUND_RED );
07096                 case Colour::BrightGreen:   return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | FOREGROUND_GREEN );
07097                 case Colour::BrightWhite:   return setTextAttribute( FOREGROUND_INTENSITY | FOREGROUND_GREEN | FOREGROUND_RED | FOREGROUND_BLUE );
07098 
07099                 case Colour::Bright: throw std::logic_error( "not a colour" );
07100             }
07101         }
07102 
07103     private:
07104         void setTextAttribute( WORD _textAttribute ) {
07105             SetConsoleTextAttribute( stdoutHandle, _textAttribute | originalBackgroundAttributes );
07106         }
07107         HANDLE stdoutHandle;
07108         WORD originalForegroundAttributes;
07109         WORD originalBackgroundAttributes;
07110     };
07111 
07112     IColourImpl* platformColourInstance() {
07113         static Win32ColourImpl s_instance;
07114 
07115         Ptr<IConfig const> config = getCurrentContext().getConfig();
07116         UseColour::YesOrNo colourMode = config
07117             ? config->useColour()
07118             : UseColour::Auto;
07119         if( colourMode == UseColour::Auto )
07120             colourMode = !isDebuggerActive()
07121                 ? UseColour::Yes
07122                 : UseColour::No;
07123         return colourMode == UseColour::Yes
07124             ? &s_instance
07125             : NoColourImpl::instance();
07126     }
07127 
07128 } // end anon namespace
07129 } // end namespace Catch
07130 
07131 #elif defined( CATCH_CONFIG_COLOUR_ANSI ) //////////////////////////////////////
07132 
07133 #include <unistd.h>
07134 
07135 namespace Catch {
07136 namespace {
07137 
07138     // use POSIX/ ANSI console terminal codes
07139     // Thanks to Adam Strzelecki for original contribution
07140     // (http://github.com/nanoant)
07141     // https://github.com/philsquared/Catch/pull/131
07142     class PosixColourImpl : public IColourImpl {
07143     public:
07144         virtual void use( Colour::Code _colourCode ) {
07145             switch( _colourCode ) {
07146                 case Colour::None:
07147                 case Colour::White:     return setColour( "[0m" );
07148                 case Colour::Red:       return setColour( "[0;31m" );
07149                 case Colour::Green:     return setColour( "[0;32m" );
07150                 case Colour::Blue:      return setColour( "[0:34m" );
07151                 case Colour::Cyan:      return setColour( "[0;36m" );
07152                 case Colour::Yellow:    return setColour( "[0;33m" );
07153                 case Colour::Grey:      return setColour( "[1;30m" );
07154 
07155                 case Colour::LightGrey:     return setColour( "[0;37m" );
07156                 case Colour::BrightRed:     return setColour( "[1;31m" );
07157                 case Colour::BrightGreen:   return setColour( "[1;32m" );
07158                 case Colour::BrightWhite:   return setColour( "[1;37m" );
07159 
07160                 case Colour::Bright: throw std::logic_error( "not a colour" );
07161             }
07162         }
07163         static IColourImpl* instance() {
07164             static PosixColourImpl s_instance;
07165             return &s_instance;
07166         }
07167 
07168     private:
07169         void setColour( const char* _escapeCode ) {
07170             Catch::cout() << '\033' << _escapeCode;
07171         }
07172     };
07173 
07174     IColourImpl* platformColourInstance() {
07175         Ptr<IConfig const> config = getCurrentContext().getConfig();
07176         UseColour::YesOrNo colourMode = config
07177             ? config->useColour()
07178             : UseColour::Auto;
07179         if( colourMode == UseColour::Auto )
07180             colourMode = (!isDebuggerActive() && isatty(STDOUT_FILENO) )
07181                 ? UseColour::Yes
07182                 : UseColour::No;
07183         return colourMode == UseColour::Yes
07184             ? PosixColourImpl::instance()
07185             : NoColourImpl::instance();
07186     }
07187 
07188 } // end anon namespace
07189 } // end namespace Catch
07190 
07191 #else  // not Windows or ANSI ///////////////////////////////////////////////
07192 
07193 namespace Catch {
07194 
07195     static IColourImpl* platformColourInstance() { return NoColourImpl::instance(); }
07196 
07197 } // end namespace Catch
07198 
07199 #endif // Windows/ ANSI/ None
07200 
07201 namespace Catch {
07202 
07203     Colour::Colour( Code _colourCode ) : m_moved( false ) { use( _colourCode ); }
07204     Colour::Colour( Colour const& _other ) : m_moved( false ) { const_cast<Colour&>( _other ).m_moved = true; }
07205     Colour::~Colour(){ if( !m_moved ) use( None ); }
07206 
07207     void Colour::use( Code _colourCode ) {
07208         static IColourImpl* impl = platformColourInstance();
07209         impl->use( _colourCode );
07210     }
07211 
07212 } // end namespace Catch
07213 
07214 // #included from: catch_generators_impl.hpp
07215 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_GENERATORS_IMPL_HPP_INCLUDED
07216 
07217 #include <vector>
07218 #include <string>
07219 #include <map>
07220 
07221 namespace Catch {
07222 
07223     struct GeneratorInfo : IGeneratorInfo {
07224 
07225         GeneratorInfo( std::size_t size )
07226         :   m_size( size ),
07227             m_currentIndex( 0 )
07228         {}
07229 
07230         bool moveNext() {
07231             if( ++m_currentIndex == m_size ) {
07232                 m_currentIndex = 0;
07233                 return false;
07234             }
07235             return true;
07236         }
07237 
07238         std::size_t getCurrentIndex() const {
07239             return m_currentIndex;
07240         }
07241 
07242         std::size_t m_size;
07243         std::size_t m_currentIndex;
07244     };
07245 
07247 
07248     class GeneratorsForTest : public IGeneratorsForTest {
07249 
07250     public:
07251         ~GeneratorsForTest() {
07252             deleteAll( m_generatorsInOrder );
07253         }
07254 
07255         IGeneratorInfo& getGeneratorInfo( std::string const& fileInfo, std::size_t size ) {
07256             std::map<std::string, IGeneratorInfo*>::const_iterator it = m_generatorsByName.find( fileInfo );
07257             if( it == m_generatorsByName.end() ) {
07258                 IGeneratorInfo* info = new GeneratorInfo( size );
07259                 m_generatorsByName.insert( std::make_pair( fileInfo, info ) );
07260                 m_generatorsInOrder.push_back( info );
07261                 return *info;
07262             }
07263             return *it->second;
07264         }
07265 
07266         bool moveNext() {
07267             std::vector<IGeneratorInfo*>::const_iterator it = m_generatorsInOrder.begin();
07268             std::vector<IGeneratorInfo*>::const_iterator itEnd = m_generatorsInOrder.end();
07269             for(; it != itEnd; ++it ) {
07270                 if( (*it)->moveNext() )
07271                     return true;
07272             }
07273             return false;
07274         }
07275 
07276     private:
07277         std::map<std::string, IGeneratorInfo*> m_generatorsByName;
07278         std::vector<IGeneratorInfo*> m_generatorsInOrder;
07279     };
07280 
07281     IGeneratorsForTest* createGeneratorsForTest()
07282     {
07283         return new GeneratorsForTest();
07284     }
07285 
07286 } // end namespace Catch
07287 
07288 // #included from: catch_assertionresult.hpp
07289 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_ASSERTIONRESULT_HPP_INCLUDED
07290 
07291 namespace Catch {
07292 
07293     AssertionInfo::AssertionInfo(   std::string const& _macroName,
07294                                     SourceLineInfo const& _lineInfo,
07295                                     std::string const& _capturedExpression,
07296                                     ResultDisposition::Flags _resultDisposition )
07297     :   macroName( _macroName ),
07298         lineInfo( _lineInfo ),
07299         capturedExpression( _capturedExpression ),
07300         resultDisposition( _resultDisposition )
07301     {}
07302 
07303     AssertionResult::AssertionResult() {}
07304 
07305     AssertionResult::AssertionResult( AssertionInfo const& info, AssertionResultData const& data )
07306     :   m_info( info ),
07307         m_resultData( data )
07308     {}
07309 
07310     AssertionResult::~AssertionResult() {}
07311 
07312     // Result was a success
07313     bool AssertionResult::succeeded() const {
07314         return Catch::isOk( m_resultData.resultType );
07315     }
07316 
07317     // Result was a success, or failure is suppressed
07318     bool AssertionResult::isOk() const {
07319         return Catch::isOk( m_resultData.resultType ) || shouldSuppressFailure( m_info.resultDisposition );
07320     }
07321 
07322     ResultWas::OfType AssertionResult::getResultType() const {
07323         return m_resultData.resultType;
07324     }
07325 
07326     bool AssertionResult::hasExpression() const {
07327         return !m_info.capturedExpression.empty();
07328     }
07329 
07330     bool AssertionResult::hasMessage() const {
07331         return !m_resultData.message.empty();
07332     }
07333 
07334     std::string AssertionResult::getExpression() const {
07335         if( isFalseTest( m_info.resultDisposition ) )
07336             return "!" + m_info.capturedExpression;
07337         else
07338             return m_info.capturedExpression;
07339     }
07340     std::string AssertionResult::getExpressionInMacro() const {
07341         if( m_info.macroName.empty() )
07342             return m_info.capturedExpression;
07343         else
07344             return m_info.macroName + "( " + m_info.capturedExpression + " )";
07345     }
07346 
07347     bool AssertionResult::hasExpandedExpression() const {
07348         return hasExpression() && getExpandedExpression() != getExpression();
07349     }
07350 
07351     std::string AssertionResult::getExpandedExpression() const {
07352         return m_resultData.reconstructedExpression;
07353     }
07354 
07355     std::string AssertionResult::getMessage() const {
07356         return m_resultData.message;
07357     }
07358     SourceLineInfo AssertionResult::getSourceInfo() const {
07359         return m_info.lineInfo;
07360     }
07361 
07362     std::string AssertionResult::getTestMacroName() const {
07363         return m_info.macroName;
07364     }
07365 
07366 } // end namespace Catch
07367 
07368 // #included from: catch_test_case_info.hpp
07369 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_TEST_CASE_INFO_HPP_INCLUDED
07370 
07371 namespace Catch {
07372 
07373     inline TestCaseInfo::SpecialProperties parseSpecialTag( std::string const& tag ) {
07374         if( startsWith( tag, "." ) ||
07375             tag == "hide" ||
07376             tag == "!hide" )
07377             return TestCaseInfo::IsHidden;
07378         else if( tag == "!throws" )
07379             return TestCaseInfo::Throws;
07380         else if( tag == "!shouldfail" )
07381             return TestCaseInfo::ShouldFail;
07382         else if( tag == "!mayfail" )
07383             return TestCaseInfo::MayFail;
07384         else
07385             return TestCaseInfo::None;
07386     }
07387     inline bool isReservedTag( std::string const& tag ) {
07388         return parseSpecialTag( tag ) == TestCaseInfo::None && tag.size() > 0 && !isalnum( tag[0] );
07389     }
07390     inline void enforceNotReservedTag( std::string const& tag, SourceLineInfo const& _lineInfo ) {
07391         if( isReservedTag( tag ) ) {
07392             {
07393                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::Red );
07394                 Catch::cerr()
07395                     << "Tag name [" << tag << "] not allowed.\n"
07396                     << "Tag names starting with non alpha-numeric characters are reserved\n";
07397             }
07398             {
07399                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::FileName );
07400                 Catch::cerr() << _lineInfo << std::endl;
07401             }
07402             exit(1);
07403         }
07404     }
07405 
07406     TestCase makeTestCase(  ITestCase* _testCase,
07407                             std::string const& _className,
07408                             std::string const& _name,
07409                             std::string const& _descOrTags,
07410                             SourceLineInfo const& _lineInfo )
07411     {
07412         bool isHidden( startsWith( _name, "./" ) ); // Legacy support
07413 
07414         // Parse out tags
07415         std::set<std::string> tags;
07416         std::string desc, tag;
07417         bool inTag = false;
07418         for( std::size_t i = 0; i < _descOrTags.size(); ++i ) {
07419             char c = _descOrTags[i];
07420             if( !inTag ) {
07421                 if( c == '[' )
07422                     inTag = true;
07423                 else
07424                     desc += c;
07425             }
07426             else {
07427                 if( c == ']' ) {
07428                     TestCaseInfo::SpecialProperties prop = parseSpecialTag( tag );
07429                     if( prop == TestCaseInfo::IsHidden )
07430                         isHidden = true;
07431                     else if( prop == TestCaseInfo::None )
07432                         enforceNotReservedTag( tag, _lineInfo );
07433 
07434                     tags.insert( tag );
07435                     tag.clear();
07436                     inTag = false;
07437                 }
07438                 else
07439                     tag += c;
07440             }
07441         }
07442         if( isHidden ) {
07443             tags.insert( "hide" );
07444             tags.insert( "." );
07445         }
07446 
07447         TestCaseInfo info( _name, _className, desc, tags, _lineInfo );
07448         return TestCase( _testCase, info );
07449     }
07450 
07451     void setTags( TestCaseInfo& testCaseInfo, std::set<std::string> const& tags )
07452     {
07453         testCaseInfo.tags = tags;
07454         testCaseInfo.lcaseTags.clear();
07455 
07456         std::ostringstream oss;
07457         for( std::set<std::string>::const_iterator it = tags.begin(), itEnd = tags.end(); it != itEnd; ++it ) {
07458             oss << "[" << *it << "]";
07459             std::string lcaseTag = toLower( *it );
07460             testCaseInfo.properties = static_cast<TestCaseInfo::SpecialProperties>( testCaseInfo.properties | parseSpecialTag( lcaseTag ) );
07461             testCaseInfo.lcaseTags.insert( lcaseTag );
07462         }
07463         testCaseInfo.tagsAsString = oss.str();
07464     }
07465 
07466     TestCaseInfo::TestCaseInfo( std::string const& _name,
07467                                 std::string const& _className,
07468                                 std::string const& _description,
07469                                 std::set<std::string> const& _tags,
07470                                 SourceLineInfo const& _lineInfo )
07471     :   name( _name ),
07472         className( _className ),
07473         description( _description ),
07474         lineInfo( _lineInfo ),
07475         properties( None )
07476     {
07477         setTags( *this, _tags );
07478     }
07479 
07480     TestCaseInfo::TestCaseInfo( TestCaseInfo const& other )
07481     :   name( other.name ),
07482         className( other.className ),
07483         description( other.description ),
07484         tags( other.tags ),
07485         lcaseTags( other.lcaseTags ),
07486         tagsAsString( other.tagsAsString ),
07487         lineInfo( other.lineInfo ),
07488         properties( other.properties )
07489     {}
07490 
07491     bool TestCaseInfo::isHidden() const {
07492         return ( properties & IsHidden ) != 0;
07493     }
07494     bool TestCaseInfo::throws() const {
07495         return ( properties & Throws ) != 0;
07496     }
07497     bool TestCaseInfo::okToFail() const {
07498         return ( properties & (ShouldFail | MayFail ) ) != 0;
07499     }
07500     bool TestCaseInfo::expectedToFail() const {
07501         return ( properties & (ShouldFail ) ) != 0;
07502     }
07503 
07504     TestCase::TestCase( ITestCase* testCase, TestCaseInfo const& info ) : TestCaseInfo( info ), test( testCase ) {}
07505 
07506     TestCase::TestCase( TestCase const& other )
07507     :   TestCaseInfo( other ),
07508         test( other.test )
07509     {}
07510 
07511     TestCase TestCase::withName( std::string const& _newName ) const {
07512         TestCase other( *this );
07513         other.name = _newName;
07514         return other;
07515     }
07516 
07517     void TestCase::swap( TestCase& other ) {
07518         test.swap( other.test );
07519         name.swap( other.name );
07520         className.swap( other.className );
07521         description.swap( other.description );
07522         tags.swap( other.tags );
07523         lcaseTags.swap( other.lcaseTags );
07524         tagsAsString.swap( other.tagsAsString );
07525         std::swap( TestCaseInfo::properties, static_cast<TestCaseInfo&>( other ).properties );
07526         std::swap( lineInfo, other.lineInfo );
07527     }
07528 
07529     void TestCase::invoke() const {
07530         test->invoke();
07531     }
07532 
07533     bool TestCase::operator == ( TestCase const& other ) const {
07534         return  test.get() == other.test.get() &&
07535                 name == other.name &&
07536                 className == other.className;
07537     }
07538 
07539     bool TestCase::operator < ( TestCase const& other ) const {
07540         return name < other.name;
07541     }
07542     TestCase& TestCase::operator = ( TestCase const& other ) {
07543         TestCase temp( other );
07544         swap( temp );
07545         return *this;
07546     }
07547 
07548     TestCaseInfo const& TestCase::getTestCaseInfo() const
07549     {
07550         return *this;
07551     }
07552 
07553 } // end namespace Catch
07554 
07555 // #included from: catch_version.hpp
07556 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_VERSION_HPP_INCLUDED
07557 
07558 namespace Catch {
07559 
07560     Version::Version
07561         (   unsigned int _majorVersion,
07562             unsigned int _minorVersion,
07563             unsigned int _patchNumber,
07564             std::string const& _branchName,
07565             unsigned int _buildNumber )
07566     :   majorVersion( _majorVersion ),
07567         minorVersion( _minorVersion ),
07568         patchNumber( _patchNumber ),
07569         branchName( _branchName ),
07570         buildNumber( _buildNumber )
07571     {}
07572 
07573     std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, Version const& version ) {
07574         os  << version.majorVersion << "."
07575             << version.minorVersion << "."
07576             << version.patchNumber;
07577 
07578         if( !version.branchName.empty() ) {
07579             os  << "-" << version.branchName
07580                 << "." << version.buildNumber;
07581         }
07582         return os;
07583     }
07584 
07585     Version libraryVersion( 1, 5, 9, "", 0 );
07586 
07587 }
07588 
07589 // #included from: catch_message.hpp
07590 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_MESSAGE_HPP_INCLUDED
07591 
07592 namespace Catch {
07593 
07594     MessageInfo::MessageInfo(   std::string const& _macroName,
07595                                 SourceLineInfo const& _lineInfo,
07596                                 ResultWas::OfType _type )
07597     :   macroName( _macroName ),
07598         lineInfo( _lineInfo ),
07599         type( _type ),
07600         sequence( ++globalCount )
07601     {}
07602 
07603     // This may need protecting if threading support is added
07604     unsigned int MessageInfo::globalCount = 0;
07605 
07607 
07608     ScopedMessage::ScopedMessage( MessageBuilder const& builder )
07609     : m_info( builder.m_info )
07610     {
07611         m_info.message = builder.m_stream.str();
07612         getResultCapture().pushScopedMessage( m_info );
07613     }
07614     ScopedMessage::ScopedMessage( ScopedMessage const& other )
07615     : m_info( other.m_info )
07616     {}
07617 
07618     ScopedMessage::~ScopedMessage() {
07619         getResultCapture().popScopedMessage( m_info );
07620     }
07621 
07622 } // end namespace Catch
07623 
07624 // #included from: catch_legacy_reporter_adapter.hpp
07625 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_LEGACY_REPORTER_ADAPTER_HPP_INCLUDED
07626 
07627 // #included from: catch_legacy_reporter_adapter.h
07628 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_LEGACY_REPORTER_ADAPTER_H_INCLUDED
07629 
07630 namespace Catch
07631 {
07632     // Deprecated
07633     struct IReporter : IShared {
07634         virtual ~IReporter();
07635 
07636         virtual bool shouldRedirectStdout() const = 0;
07637 
07638         virtual void StartTesting() = 0;
07639         virtual void EndTesting( Totals const& totals ) = 0;
07640         virtual void StartGroup( std::string const& groupName ) = 0;
07641         virtual void EndGroup( std::string const& groupName, Totals const& totals ) = 0;
07642         virtual void StartTestCase( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo ) = 0;
07643         virtual void EndTestCase( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo, Totals const& totals, std::string const& stdOut, std::string const& stdErr ) = 0;
07644         virtual void StartSection( std::string const& sectionName, std::string const& description ) = 0;
07645         virtual void EndSection( std::string const& sectionName, Counts const& assertions ) = 0;
07646         virtual void NoAssertionsInSection( std::string const& sectionName ) = 0;
07647         virtual void NoAssertionsInTestCase( std::string const& testName ) = 0;
07648         virtual void Aborted() = 0;
07649         virtual void Result( AssertionResult const& result ) = 0;
07650     };
07651 
07652     class LegacyReporterAdapter : public SharedImpl<IStreamingReporter>
07653     {
07654     public:
07655         LegacyReporterAdapter( Ptr<IReporter> const& legacyReporter );
07656         virtual ~LegacyReporterAdapter();
07657 
07658         virtual ReporterPreferences getPreferences() const;
07659         virtual void noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& );
07660         virtual void testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& );
07661         virtual void testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& groupInfo );
07662         virtual void testCaseStarting( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo );
07663         virtual void sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& sectionInfo );
07664         virtual void assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& );
07665         virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats );
07666         virtual void sectionEnded( SectionStats const& sectionStats );
07667         virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& testCaseStats );
07668         virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& testGroupStats );
07669         virtual void testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& testRunStats );
07670         virtual void skipTest( TestCaseInfo const& );
07671 
07672     private:
07673         Ptr<IReporter> m_legacyReporter;
07674     };
07675 }
07676 
07677 namespace Catch
07678 {
07679     LegacyReporterAdapter::LegacyReporterAdapter( Ptr<IReporter> const& legacyReporter )
07680     :   m_legacyReporter( legacyReporter )
07681     {}
07682     LegacyReporterAdapter::~LegacyReporterAdapter() {}
07683 
07684     ReporterPreferences LegacyReporterAdapter::getPreferences() const {
07685         ReporterPreferences prefs;
07686         prefs.shouldRedirectStdOut = m_legacyReporter->shouldRedirectStdout();
07687         return prefs;
07688     }
07689 
07690     void LegacyReporterAdapter::noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& ) {}
07691     void LegacyReporterAdapter::testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& ) {
07692         m_legacyReporter->StartTesting();
07693     }
07694     void LegacyReporterAdapter::testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& groupInfo ) {
07695         m_legacyReporter->StartGroup( groupInfo.name );
07696     }
07697     void LegacyReporterAdapter::testCaseStarting( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo ) {
07698         m_legacyReporter->StartTestCase( testInfo );
07699     }
07700     void LegacyReporterAdapter::sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& sectionInfo ) {
07701         m_legacyReporter->StartSection( sectionInfo.name, sectionInfo.description );
07702     }
07703     void LegacyReporterAdapter::assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& ) {
07704         // Not on legacy interface
07705     }
07706 
07707     bool LegacyReporterAdapter::assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats ) {
07708         if( assertionStats.assertionResult.getResultType() != ResultWas::Ok ) {
07709             for( std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator it = assertionStats.infoMessages.begin(), itEnd = assertionStats.infoMessages.end();
07710                     it != itEnd;
07711                     ++it ) {
07712                 if( it->type == ResultWas::Info ) {
07713                     ResultBuilder rb( it->macroName.c_str(), it->lineInfo, "", ResultDisposition::Normal );
07714                     rb << it->message;
07715                     rb.setResultType( ResultWas::Info );
07716                     AssertionResult result = rb.build();
07717                     m_legacyReporter->Result( result );
07718                 }
07719             }
07720         }
07721         m_legacyReporter->Result( assertionStats.assertionResult );
07722         return true;
07723     }
07724     void LegacyReporterAdapter::sectionEnded( SectionStats const& sectionStats ) {
07725         if( sectionStats.missingAssertions )
07726             m_legacyReporter->NoAssertionsInSection( sectionStats.sectionInfo.name );
07727         m_legacyReporter->EndSection( sectionStats.sectionInfo.name, sectionStats.assertions );
07728     }
07729     void LegacyReporterAdapter::testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& testCaseStats ) {
07730         m_legacyReporter->EndTestCase
07731             (   testCaseStats.testInfo,
07732                 testCaseStats.totals,
07733                 testCaseStats.stdOut,
07734                 testCaseStats.stdErr );
07735     }
07736     void LegacyReporterAdapter::testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& testGroupStats ) {
07737         if( testGroupStats.aborting )
07738             m_legacyReporter->Aborted();
07739         m_legacyReporter->EndGroup( testGroupStats.groupInfo.name, testGroupStats.totals );
07740     }
07741     void LegacyReporterAdapter::testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& testRunStats ) {
07742         m_legacyReporter->EndTesting( testRunStats.totals );
07743     }
07744     void LegacyReporterAdapter::skipTest( TestCaseInfo const& ) {
07745     }
07746 }
07747 
07748 // #included from: catch_timer.hpp
07749 
07750 #ifdef __clang__
07751 #pragma clang diagnostic push
07752 #pragma clang diagnostic ignored "-Wc++11-long-long"
07753 #endif
07754 
07755 #ifdef CATCH_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
07756 #include <windows.h>
07757 #else
07758 #include <sys/time.h>
07759 #endif
07760 
07761 namespace Catch {
07762 
07763     namespace {
07764 #ifdef CATCH_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
07765         uint64_t getCurrentTicks() {
07766             static uint64_t hz=0, hzo=0;
07767             if (!hz) {
07768                 QueryPerformanceFrequency( reinterpret_cast<LARGE_INTEGER*>( &hz ) );
07769                 QueryPerformanceCounter( reinterpret_cast<LARGE_INTEGER*>( &hzo ) );
07770             }
07771             uint64_t t;
07772             QueryPerformanceCounter( reinterpret_cast<LARGE_INTEGER*>( &t ) );
07773             return ((t-hzo)*1000000)/hz;
07774         }
07775 #else
07776         uint64_t getCurrentTicks() {
07777             timeval t;
07778             gettimeofday(&t,CATCH_NULL);
07779             return static_cast<uint64_t>( t.tv_sec ) * 1000000ull + static_cast<uint64_t>( t.tv_usec );
07780         }
07781 #endif
07782     }
07783 
07784     void Timer::start() {
07785         m_ticks = getCurrentTicks();
07786     }
07787     unsigned int Timer::getElapsedMicroseconds() const {
07788         return static_cast<unsigned int>(getCurrentTicks() - m_ticks);
07789     }
07790     unsigned int Timer::getElapsedMilliseconds() const {
07791         return static_cast<unsigned int>(getElapsedMicroseconds()/1000);
07792     }
07793     double Timer::getElapsedSeconds() const {
07794         return getElapsedMicroseconds()/1000000.0;
07795     }
07796 
07797 } // namespace Catch
07798 
07799 #ifdef __clang__
07800 #pragma clang diagnostic pop
07801 #endif
07802 // #included from: catch_common.hpp
07803 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_COMMON_HPP_INCLUDED
07804 
07805 namespace Catch {
07806 
07807     bool startsWith( std::string const& s, std::string const& prefix ) {
07808         return s.size() >= prefix.size() && s.substr( 0, prefix.size() ) == prefix;
07809     }
07810     bool endsWith( std::string const& s, std::string const& suffix ) {
07811         return s.size() >= suffix.size() && s.substr( s.size()-suffix.size(), suffix.size() ) == suffix;
07812     }
07813     bool contains( std::string const& s, std::string const& infix ) {
07814         return s.find( infix ) != std::string::npos;
07815     }
07816     char toLowerCh(char c) {
07817         return static_cast<char>( ::tolower( c ) );
07818     }
07819     void toLowerInPlace( std::string& s ) {
07820         std::transform( s.begin(), s.end(), s.begin(), toLowerCh );
07821     }
07822     std::string toLower( std::string const& s ) {
07823         std::string lc = s;
07824         toLowerInPlace( lc );
07825         return lc;
07826     }
07827     std::string trim( std::string const& str ) {
07828         static char const* whitespaceChars = "\n\r\t ";
07829         std::string::size_type start = str.find_first_not_of( whitespaceChars );
07830         std::string::size_type end = str.find_last_not_of( whitespaceChars );
07831 
07832         return start != std::string::npos ? str.substr( start, 1+end-start ) : "";
07833     }
07834 
07835     bool replaceInPlace( std::string& str, std::string const& replaceThis, std::string const& withThis ) {
07836         bool replaced = false;
07837         std::size_t i = str.find( replaceThis );
07838         while( i != std::string::npos ) {
07839             replaced = true;
07840             str = str.substr( 0, i ) + withThis + str.substr( i+replaceThis.size() );
07841             if( i < str.size()-withThis.size() )
07842                 i = str.find( replaceThis, i+withThis.size() );
07843             else
07844                 i = std::string::npos;
07845         }
07846         return replaced;
07847     }
07848 
07849     pluralise::pluralise( std::size_t count, std::string const& label )
07850     :   m_count( count ),
07851         m_label( label )
07852     {}
07853 
07854     std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, pluralise const& pluraliser ) {
07855         os << pluraliser.m_count << " " << pluraliser.m_label;
07856         if( pluraliser.m_count != 1 )
07857             os << "s";
07858         return os;
07859     }
07860 
07861     SourceLineInfo::SourceLineInfo() : line( 0 ){}
07862     SourceLineInfo::SourceLineInfo( char const* _file, std::size_t _line )
07863     :   file( _file ),
07864         line( _line )
07865     {}
07866     SourceLineInfo::SourceLineInfo( SourceLineInfo const& other )
07867     :   file( other.file ),
07868         line( other.line )
07869     {}
07870     bool SourceLineInfo::empty() const {
07871         return file.empty();
07872     }
07873     bool SourceLineInfo::operator == ( SourceLineInfo const& other ) const {
07874         return line == other.line && file == other.file;
07875     }
07876     bool SourceLineInfo::operator < ( SourceLineInfo const& other ) const {
07877         return line < other.line || ( line == other.line  && file < other.file );
07878     }
07879 
07880     void seedRng( IConfig const& config ) {
07881         if( config.rngSeed() != 0 )
07882             std::srand( config.rngSeed() );
07883     }
07884     unsigned int rngSeed() {
07885         return getCurrentContext().getConfig()->rngSeed();
07886     }
07887 
07888     std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, SourceLineInfo const& info ) {
07889 #ifndef __GNUG__
07890         os << info.file << "(" << info.line << ")";
07891 #else
07892         os << info.file << ":" << info.line;
07893 #endif
07894         return os;
07895     }
07896 
07897     void throwLogicError( std::string const& message, SourceLineInfo const& locationInfo ) {
07898         std::ostringstream oss;
07899         oss << locationInfo << ": Internal Catch error: '" << message << "'";
07900         if( alwaysTrue() )
07901             throw std::logic_error( oss.str() );
07902     }
07903 }
07904 
07905 // #included from: catch_section.hpp
07906 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_SECTION_HPP_INCLUDED
07907 
07908 namespace Catch {
07909 
07910     SectionInfo::SectionInfo
07911         (   SourceLineInfo const& _lineInfo,
07912             std::string const& _name,
07913             std::string const& _description )
07914     :   name( _name ),
07915         description( _description ),
07916         lineInfo( _lineInfo )
07917     {}
07918 
07919     Section::Section( SectionInfo const& info )
07920     :   m_info( info ),
07921         m_sectionIncluded( getResultCapture().sectionStarted( m_info, m_assertions ) )
07922     {
07923         m_timer.start();
07924     }
07925 
07926     Section::~Section() {
07927         if( m_sectionIncluded ) {
07928             SectionEndInfo endInfo( m_info, m_assertions, m_timer.getElapsedSeconds() );
07929             if( std::uncaught_exception() )
07930                 getResultCapture().sectionEndedEarly( endInfo );
07931             else
07932                 getResultCapture().sectionEnded( endInfo );
07933         }
07934     }
07935 
07936     // This indicates whether the section should be executed or not
07937     Section::operator bool() const {
07938         return m_sectionIncluded;
07939     }
07940 
07941 } // end namespace Catch
07942 
07943 // #included from: catch_debugger.hpp
07944 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_DEBUGGER_HPP_INCLUDED
07945 
07946 #include <iostream>
07947 
07948 #ifdef CATCH_PLATFORM_MAC
07949 
07950     #include <assert.h>
07951     #include <stdbool.h>
07952     #include <sys/types.h>
07953     #include <unistd.h>
07954     #include <sys/sysctl.h>
07955 
07956     namespace Catch{
07957 
07958         // The following function is taken directly from the following technical note:
07959         // http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#qa/qa2004/qa1361.html
07960 
07961         // Returns true if the current process is being debugged (either
07962         // running under the debugger or has a debugger attached post facto).
07963         bool isDebuggerActive(){
07964 
07965             int                 mib[4];
07966             struct kinfo_proc   info;
07967             size_t              size;
07968 
07969             // Initialize the flags so that, if sysctl fails for some bizarre
07970             // reason, we get a predictable result.
07971 
07972             info.kp_proc.p_flag = 0;
07973 
07974             // Initialize mib, which tells sysctl the info we want, in this case
07975             // we're looking for information about a specific process ID.
07976 
07977             mib[0] = CTL_KERN;
07978             mib[1] = KERN_PROC;
07979             mib[2] = KERN_PROC_PID;
07980             mib[3] = getpid();
07981 
07982             // Call sysctl.
07983 
07984             size = sizeof(info);
07985             if( sysctl(mib, sizeof(mib) / sizeof(*mib), &info, &size, CATCH_NULL, 0) != 0 ) {
07986                 Catch::cerr() << "\n** Call to sysctl failed - unable to determine if debugger is active **\n" << std::endl;
07987                 return false;
07988             }
07989 
07990             // We're being debugged if the P_TRACED flag is set.
07991 
07992             return ( (info.kp_proc.p_flag & P_TRACED) != 0 );
07993         }
07994     } // namespace Catch
07995 
07996 #elif defined(_MSC_VER)
07997     extern "C" __declspec(dllimport) int __stdcall IsDebuggerPresent();
07998     namespace Catch {
07999         bool isDebuggerActive() {
08000             return IsDebuggerPresent() != 0;
08001         }
08002     }
08003 #elif defined(__MINGW32__)
08004     extern "C" __declspec(dllimport) int __stdcall IsDebuggerPresent();
08005     namespace Catch {
08006         bool isDebuggerActive() {
08007             return IsDebuggerPresent() != 0;
08008         }
08009     }
08010 #else
08011     namespace Catch {
08012        inline bool isDebuggerActive() { return false; }
08013     }
08014 #endif // Platform
08015 
08016 #ifdef CATCH_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
08017     extern "C" __declspec(dllimport) void __stdcall OutputDebugStringA( const char* );
08018     namespace Catch {
08019         void writeToDebugConsole( std::string const& text ) {
08020             ::OutputDebugStringA( text.c_str() );
08021         }
08022     }
08023 #else
08024     namespace Catch {
08025         void writeToDebugConsole( std::string const& text ) {
08026             // !TBD: Need a version for Mac/ XCode and other IDEs
08027             Catch::cout() << text;
08028         }
08029     }
08030 #endif // Platform
08031 
08032 // #included from: catch_tostring.hpp
08033 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_TOSTRING_HPP_INCLUDED
08034 
08035 namespace Catch {
08036 
08037 namespace Detail {
08038 
08039     const std::string unprintableString = "{?}";
08040 
08041     namespace {
08042         const int hexThreshold = 255;
08043 
08044         struct Endianness {
08045             enum Arch { Big, Little };
08046 
08047             static Arch which() {
08048                 union _{
08049                     int asInt;
08050                     char asChar[sizeof (int)];
08051                 } u;
08052 
08053                 u.asInt = 1;
08054                 return ( u.asChar[sizeof(int)-1] == 1 ) ? Big : Little;
08055             }
08056         };
08057     }
08058 
08059     std::string rawMemoryToString( const void *object, std::size_t size )
08060     {
08061         // Reverse order for little endian architectures
08062         int i = 0, end = static_cast<int>( size ), inc = 1;
08063         if( Endianness::which() == Endianness::Little ) {
08064             i = end-1;
08065             end = inc = -1;
08066         }
08067 
08068         unsigned char const *bytes = static_cast<unsigned char const *>(object);
08069         std::ostringstream os;
08070         os << "0x" << std::setfill('0') << std::hex;
08071         for( ; i != end; i += inc )
08072              os << std::setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned>(bytes[i]);
08073        return os.str();
08074     }
08075 }
08076 
08077 std::string toString( std::string const& value ) {
08078     std::string s = value;
08079     if( getCurrentContext().getConfig()->showInvisibles() ) {
08080         for(size_t i = 0; i < s.size(); ++i ) {
08081             std::string subs;
08082             switch( s[i] ) {
08083             case '\n': subs = "\\n"; break;
08084             case '\t': subs = "\\t"; break;
08085             default: break;
08086             }
08087             if( !subs.empty() ) {
08088                 s = s.substr( 0, i ) + subs + s.substr( i+1 );
08089                 ++i;
08090             }
08091         }
08092     }
08093     return "\"" + s + "\"";
08094 }
08095 std::string toString( std::wstring const& value ) {
08096 
08097     std::string s;
08098     s.reserve( value.size() );
08099     for(size_t i = 0; i < value.size(); ++i )
08100         s += value[i] <= 0xff ? static_cast<char>( value[i] ) : '?';
08101     return Catch::toString( s );
08102 }
08103 
08104 std::string toString( const char* const value ) {
08105     return value ? Catch::toString( std::string( value ) ) : std::string( "{null string}" );
08106 }
08107 
08108 std::string toString( char* const value ) {
08109     return Catch::toString( static_cast<const char*>( value ) );
08110 }
08111 
08112 std::string toString( const wchar_t* const value )
08113 {
08114     return value ? Catch::toString( std::wstring(value) ) : std::string( "{null string}" );
08115 }
08116 
08117 std::string toString( wchar_t* const value )
08118 {
08119     return Catch::toString( static_cast<const wchar_t*>( value ) );
08120 }
08121 
08122 std::string toString( int value ) {
08123     std::ostringstream oss;
08124     oss << value;
08125     if( value > Detail::hexThreshold )
08126         oss << " (0x" << std::hex << value << ")";
08127     return oss.str();
08128 }
08129 
08130 std::string toString( unsigned long value ) {
08131     std::ostringstream oss;
08132     oss << value;
08133     if( value > Detail::hexThreshold )
08134         oss << " (0x" << std::hex << value << ")";
08135     return oss.str();
08136 }
08137 
08138 std::string toString( unsigned int value ) {
08139     return Catch::toString( static_cast<unsigned long>( value ) );
08140 }
08141 
08142 template<typename T>
08143 std::string fpToString( T value, int precision ) {
08144     std::ostringstream oss;
08145     oss << std::setprecision( precision )
08146         << std::fixed
08147         << value;
08148     std::string d = oss.str();
08149     std::size_t i = d.find_last_not_of( '0' );
08150     if( i != std::string::npos && i != d.size()-1 ) {
08151         if( d[i] == '.' )
08152             i++;
08153         d = d.substr( 0, i+1 );
08154     }
08155     return d;
08156 }
08157 
08158 std::string toString( const double value ) {
08159     return fpToString( value, 10 );
08160 }
08161 std::string toString( const float value ) {
08162     return fpToString( value, 5 ) + "f";
08163 }
08164 
08165 std::string toString( bool value ) {
08166     return value ? "true" : "false";
08167 }
08168 
08169 std::string toString( char value ) {
08170     return value < ' '
08171         ? toString( static_cast<unsigned int>( value ) )
08172         : Detail::makeString( value );
08173 }
08174 
08175 std::string toString( signed char value ) {
08176     return toString( static_cast<char>( value ) );
08177 }
08178 
08179 std::string toString( unsigned char value ) {
08180     return toString( static_cast<char>( value ) );
08181 }
08182 
08183 #ifdef CATCH_CONFIG_CPP11_LONG_LONG
