08184 std::string toString( long long value ) {
08185     std::ostringstream oss;
08186     oss << value;
08187     if( value > Detail::hexThreshold )
08188         oss << " (0x" << std::hex << value << ")";
08189     return oss.str();
08190 }
08191 std::string toString( unsigned long long value ) {
08192     std::ostringstream oss;
08193     oss << value;
08194     if( value > Detail::hexThreshold )
08195         oss << " (0x" << std::hex << value << ")";
08196     return oss.str();
08197 }
08198 #endif
08199 
08200 #ifdef CATCH_CONFIG_CPP11_NULLPTR
08201 std::string toString( std::nullptr_t ) {
08202     return "nullptr";
08203 }
08204 #endif
08205 
08206 #ifdef __OBJC__
08207     std::string toString( NSString const * const& nsstring ) {
08208         if( !nsstring )
08209             return "nil";
08210         return "@" + toString([nsstring UTF8String]);
08211     }
08212     std::string toString( NSString * CATCH_ARC_STRONG const& nsstring ) {
08213         if( !nsstring )
08214             return "nil";
08215         return "@" + toString([nsstring UTF8String]);
08216     }
08217     std::string toString( NSObject* const& nsObject ) {
08218         return toString( [nsObject description] );
08219     }
08220 #endif
08221 
08222 } // end namespace Catch
08223 
08224 // #included from: catch_result_builder.hpp
08225 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_RESULT_BUILDER_HPP_INCLUDED
08226 
08227 namespace Catch {
08228 
08229     std::string capturedExpressionWithSecondArgument( std::string const& capturedExpression, std::string const& secondArg ) {
08230         return secondArg.empty() || secondArg == "\"\""
08231             ? capturedExpression
08232             : capturedExpression + ", " + secondArg;
08233     }
08234     ResultBuilder::ResultBuilder(   char const* macroName,
08235                                     SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo,
08236                                     char const* capturedExpression,
08237                                     ResultDisposition::Flags resultDisposition,
08238                                     char const* secondArg )
08239     :   m_assertionInfo( macroName, lineInfo, capturedExpressionWithSecondArgument( capturedExpression, secondArg ), resultDisposition ),
08240         m_shouldDebugBreak( false ),
08241         m_shouldThrow( false )
08242     {}
08243 
08244     ResultBuilder& ResultBuilder::setResultType( ResultWas::OfType result ) {
08245         m_data.resultType = result;
08246         return *this;
08247     }
08248     ResultBuilder& ResultBuilder::setResultType( bool result ) {
08249         m_data.resultType = result ? ResultWas::Ok : ResultWas::ExpressionFailed;
08250         return *this;
08251     }
08252     ResultBuilder& ResultBuilder::setLhs( std::string const& lhs ) {
08253         m_exprComponents.lhs = lhs;
08254         return *this;
08255     }
08256     ResultBuilder& ResultBuilder::setRhs( std::string const& rhs ) {
08257         m_exprComponents.rhs = rhs;
08258         return *this;
08259     }
08260     ResultBuilder& ResultBuilder::setOp( std::string const& op ) {
08261         m_exprComponents.op = op;
08262         return *this;
08263     }
08264 
08265     void ResultBuilder::endExpression() {
08266         m_exprComponents.testFalse = isFalseTest( m_assertionInfo.resultDisposition );
08267         captureExpression();
08268     }
08269 
08270     void ResultBuilder::useActiveException( ResultDisposition::Flags resultDisposition ) {
08271         m_assertionInfo.resultDisposition = resultDisposition;
08272         m_stream.oss << Catch::translateActiveException();
08273         captureResult( ResultWas::ThrewException );
08274     }
08275 
08276     void ResultBuilder::captureResult( ResultWas::OfType resultType ) {
08277         setResultType( resultType );
08278         captureExpression();
08279     }
08280     void ResultBuilder::captureExpectedException( std::string const& expectedMessage ) {
08281         if( expectedMessage.empty() )
08282             captureExpectedException( Matchers::Impl::Generic::AllOf<std::string>() );
08283         else
08284             captureExpectedException( Matchers::Equals( expectedMessage ) );
08285     }
08286 
08287     void ResultBuilder::captureExpectedException( Matchers::Impl::Matcher<std::string> const& matcher ) {
08288 
08289         assert( m_exprComponents.testFalse == false );
08290         AssertionResultData data = m_data;
08291         data.resultType = ResultWas::Ok;
08292         data.reconstructedExpression = m_assertionInfo.capturedExpression;
08293 
08294         std::string actualMessage = Catch::translateActiveException();
08295         if( !matcher.match( actualMessage ) ) {
08296             data.resultType = ResultWas::ExpressionFailed;
08297             data.reconstructedExpression = actualMessage;
08298         }
08299         AssertionResult result( m_assertionInfo, data );
08300         handleResult( result );
08301     }
08302 
08303     void ResultBuilder::captureExpression() {
08304         AssertionResult result = build();
08305         handleResult( result );
08306     }
08307     void ResultBuilder::handleResult( AssertionResult const& result )
08308     {
08309         getResultCapture().assertionEnded( result );
08310 
08311         if( !result.isOk() ) {
08312             if( getCurrentContext().getConfig()->shouldDebugBreak() )
08313                 m_shouldDebugBreak = true;
08314             if( getCurrentContext().getRunner()->aborting() || (m_assertionInfo.resultDisposition & ResultDisposition::Normal) )
08315                 m_shouldThrow = true;
08316         }
08317     }
08318     void ResultBuilder::react() {
08319         if( m_shouldThrow )
08320             throw Catch::TestFailureException();
08321     }
08322 
08323     bool ResultBuilder::shouldDebugBreak() const { return m_shouldDebugBreak; }
08324     bool ResultBuilder::allowThrows() const { return getCurrentContext().getConfig()->allowThrows(); }
08325 
08326     AssertionResult ResultBuilder::build() const
08327     {
08328         assert( m_data.resultType != ResultWas::Unknown );
08329 
08330         AssertionResultData data = m_data;
08331 
08332         // Flip bool results if testFalse is set
08333         if( m_exprComponents.testFalse ) {
08334             if( data.resultType == ResultWas::Ok )
08335                 data.resultType = ResultWas::ExpressionFailed;
08336             else if( data.resultType == ResultWas::ExpressionFailed )
08337                 data.resultType = ResultWas::Ok;
08338         }
08339 
08340         data.message = m_stream.oss.str();
08341         data.reconstructedExpression = reconstructExpression();
08342         if( m_exprComponents.testFalse ) {
08343             if( m_exprComponents.op == "" )
08344                 data.reconstructedExpression = "!" + data.reconstructedExpression;
08345             else
08346                 data.reconstructedExpression = "!(" + data.reconstructedExpression + ")";
08347         }
08348         return AssertionResult( m_assertionInfo, data );
08349     }
08350     std::string ResultBuilder::reconstructExpression() const {
08351         if( m_exprComponents.op == "" )
08352             return m_exprComponents.lhs.empty() ? m_assertionInfo.capturedExpression : m_exprComponents.op + m_exprComponents.lhs;
08353         else if( m_exprComponents.op == "matches" )
08354             return m_exprComponents.lhs + " " + m_exprComponents.rhs;
08355         else if( m_exprComponents.op != "!" ) {
08356             if( m_exprComponents.lhs.size() + m_exprComponents.rhs.size() < 40 &&
08357                 m_exprComponents.lhs.find("\n") == std::string::npos &&
08358                 m_exprComponents.rhs.find("\n") == std::string::npos )
08359                 return m_exprComponents.lhs + " " + m_exprComponents.op + " " + m_exprComponents.rhs;
08360             else
08361                 return m_exprComponents.lhs + "\n" + m_exprComponents.op + "\n" + m_exprComponents.rhs;
08362         }
08363         else
08364             return "{can't expand - use " + m_assertionInfo.macroName + "_FALSE( " + m_assertionInfo.capturedExpression.substr(1) + " ) instead of " + m_assertionInfo.macroName + "( " + m_assertionInfo.capturedExpression + " ) for better diagnostics}";
08365     }
08366 
08367 } // end namespace Catch
08368 
08369 // #included from: catch_tag_alias_registry.hpp
08370 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_TAG_ALIAS_REGISTRY_HPP_INCLUDED
08371 
08372 // #included from: catch_tag_alias_registry.h
08373 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_TAG_ALIAS_REGISTRY_H_INCLUDED
08374 
08375 #include <map>
08376 
08377 namespace Catch {
08378 
08379     class TagAliasRegistry : public ITagAliasRegistry {
08380     public:
08381         virtual ~TagAliasRegistry();
08382         virtual Option<TagAlias> find( std::string const& alias ) const;
08383         virtual std::string expandAliases( std::string const& unexpandedTestSpec ) const;
08384         void add( char const* alias, char const* tag, SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo );
08385         static TagAliasRegistry& get();
08386 
08387     private:
08388         std::map<std::string, TagAlias> m_registry;
08389     };
08390 
08391 } // end namespace Catch
08392 
08393 #include <map>
08394 #include <iostream>
08395 
08396 namespace Catch {
08397 
08398     TagAliasRegistry::~TagAliasRegistry() {}
08399 
08400     Option<TagAlias> TagAliasRegistry::find( std::string const& alias ) const {
08401         std::map<std::string, TagAlias>::const_iterator it = m_registry.find( alias );
08402         if( it != m_registry.end() )
08403             return it->second;
08404         else
08405             return Option<TagAlias>();
08406     }
08407 
08408     std::string TagAliasRegistry::expandAliases( std::string const& unexpandedTestSpec ) const {
08409         std::string expandedTestSpec = unexpandedTestSpec;
08410         for( std::map<std::string, TagAlias>::const_iterator it = m_registry.begin(), itEnd = m_registry.end();
08411                 it != itEnd;
08412                 ++it ) {
08413             std::size_t pos = expandedTestSpec.find( it->first );
08414             if( pos != std::string::npos ) {
08415                 expandedTestSpec =  expandedTestSpec.substr( 0, pos ) +
08416                                     it->second.tag +
08417                                     expandedTestSpec.substr( pos + it->first.size() );
08418             }
08419         }
08420         return expandedTestSpec;
08421     }
08422 
08423     void TagAliasRegistry::add( char const* alias, char const* tag, SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo ) {
08424 
08425         if( !startsWith( alias, "[@" ) || !endsWith( alias, "]" ) ) {
08426             std::ostringstream oss;
08427             oss << "error: tag alias, \"" << alias << "\" is not of the form [@alias name].\n" << lineInfo;
08428             throw std::domain_error( oss.str().c_str() );
08429         }
08430         if( !m_registry.insert( std::make_pair( alias, TagAlias( tag, lineInfo ) ) ).second ) {
08431             std::ostringstream oss;
08432             oss << "error: tag alias, \"" << alias << "\" already registered.\n"
08433                 << "\tFirst seen at " << find(alias)->lineInfo << "\n"
08434                 << "\tRedefined at " << lineInfo;
08435             throw std::domain_error( oss.str().c_str() );
08436         }
08437     }
08438 
08439     TagAliasRegistry& TagAliasRegistry::get() {
08440         static TagAliasRegistry instance;
08441         return instance;
08442 
08443     }
08444 
08445     ITagAliasRegistry::~ITagAliasRegistry() {}
08446     ITagAliasRegistry const& ITagAliasRegistry::get() { return TagAliasRegistry::get(); }
08447 
08448     RegistrarForTagAliases::RegistrarForTagAliases( char const* alias, char const* tag, SourceLineInfo const& lineInfo ) {
08449         try {
08450             TagAliasRegistry::get().add( alias, tag, lineInfo );
08451         }
08452         catch( std::exception& ex ) {
08453             Colour colourGuard( Colour::Red );
08454             Catch::cerr() << ex.what() << std::endl;
08455             exit(1);
08456         }
08457     }
08458 
08459 } // end namespace Catch
08460 
08461 // #included from: ../reporters/catch_reporter_multi.hpp
08462 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_MULTI_HPP_INCLUDED
08463 
08464 namespace Catch {
08465 
08466 class MultipleReporters : public SharedImpl<IStreamingReporter> {
08467     typedef std::vector<Ptr<IStreamingReporter> > Reporters;
08468     Reporters m_reporters;
08469 
08470 public:
08471     void add( Ptr<IStreamingReporter> const& reporter ) {
08472         m_reporters.push_back( reporter );
08473     }
08474 
08475 public: // IStreamingReporter
08476 
08477     virtual ReporterPreferences getPreferences() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08478         return m_reporters[0]->getPreferences();
08479     }
08480 
08481     virtual void noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& spec ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08482         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08483                 it != itEnd;
08484                 ++it )
08485             (*it)->noMatchingTestCases( spec );
08486     }
08487 
08488     virtual void testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& testRunInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08489         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08490                 it != itEnd;
08491                 ++it )
08492             (*it)->testRunStarting( testRunInfo );
08493     }
08494 
08495     virtual void testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& groupInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08496         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08497                 it != itEnd;
08498                 ++it )
08499             (*it)->testGroupStarting( groupInfo );
08500     }
08501 
08502     virtual void testCaseStarting( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08503         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08504                 it != itEnd;
08505                 ++it )
08506             (*it)->testCaseStarting( testInfo );
08507     }
08508 
08509     virtual void sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& sectionInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08510         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08511                 it != itEnd;
08512                 ++it )
08513             (*it)->sectionStarting( sectionInfo );
08514     }
08515 
08516     virtual void assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& assertionInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08517         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08518                 it != itEnd;
08519                 ++it )
08520             (*it)->assertionStarting( assertionInfo );
08521     }
08522 
08523     // The return value indicates if the messages buffer should be cleared:
08524     virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08525         bool clearBuffer = false;
08526         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08527                 it != itEnd;
08528                 ++it )
08529             clearBuffer |= (*it)->assertionEnded( assertionStats );
08530         return clearBuffer;
08531     }
08532 
08533     virtual void sectionEnded( SectionStats const& sectionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08534         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08535                 it != itEnd;
08536                 ++it )
08537             (*it)->sectionEnded( sectionStats );
08538     }
08539 
08540     virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& testCaseStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08541         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08542                 it != itEnd;
08543                 ++it )
08544             (*it)->testCaseEnded( testCaseStats );
08545     }
08546 
08547     virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& testGroupStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08548         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08549                 it != itEnd;
08550                 ++it )
08551             (*it)->testGroupEnded( testGroupStats );
08552     }
08553 
08554     virtual void testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& testRunStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08555         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08556                 it != itEnd;
08557                 ++it )
08558             (*it)->testRunEnded( testRunStats );
08559     }
08560 
08561     virtual void skipTest( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08562         for( Reporters::const_iterator it = m_reporters.begin(), itEnd = m_reporters.end();
08563                 it != itEnd;
08564                 ++it )
08565             (*it)->skipTest( testInfo );
08566     }
08567 
08568     virtual MultipleReporters* tryAsMulti() CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08569         return this;
08570     }
08571 
08572 };
08573 
08574 Ptr<IStreamingReporter> addReporter( Ptr<IStreamingReporter> const& existingReporter, Ptr<IStreamingReporter> const& additionalReporter ) {
08575     Ptr<IStreamingReporter> resultingReporter;
08576 
08577     if( existingReporter ) {
08578         MultipleReporters* multi = existingReporter->tryAsMulti();
08579         if( !multi ) {
08580             multi = new MultipleReporters;
08581             resultingReporter = Ptr<IStreamingReporter>( multi );
08582             if( existingReporter )
08583                 multi->add( existingReporter );
08584         }
08585         else
08586             resultingReporter = existingReporter;
08587         multi->add( additionalReporter );
08588     }
08589     else
08590         resultingReporter = additionalReporter;
08591 
08592     return resultingReporter;
08593 }
08594 
08595 } // end namespace Catch
08596 
08597 // #included from: ../reporters/catch_reporter_xml.hpp
08598 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_XML_HPP_INCLUDED
08599 
08600 // #included from: catch_reporter_bases.hpp
08601 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_BASES_HPP_INCLUDED
08602 
08603 #include <cstring>
08604 
08605 namespace Catch {
08606 
08607     struct StreamingReporterBase : SharedImpl<IStreamingReporter> {
08608 
08609         StreamingReporterBase( ReporterConfig const& _config )
08610         :   m_config( _config.fullConfig() ),
08611             stream( _config.stream() )
08612         {
08613             m_reporterPrefs.shouldRedirectStdOut = false;
08614         }
08615 
08616         virtual ReporterPreferences getPreferences() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08617             return m_reporterPrefs;
08618         }
08619 
08620         virtual ~StreamingReporterBase() CATCH_OVERRIDE;
08621 
08622         virtual void noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08623 
08624         virtual void testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& _testRunInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08625             currentTestRunInfo = _testRunInfo;
08626         }
08627         virtual void testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& _groupInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08628             currentGroupInfo = _groupInfo;
08629         }
08630 
08631         virtual void testCaseStarting( TestCaseInfo const& _testInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08632             currentTestCaseInfo = _testInfo;
08633         }
08634         virtual void sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& _sectionInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08635             m_sectionStack.push_back( _sectionInfo );
08636         }
08637 
08638         virtual void sectionEnded( SectionStats const& /* _sectionStats */ ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08639             m_sectionStack.pop_back();
08640         }
08641         virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& /* _testCaseStats */ ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08642             currentTestCaseInfo.reset();
08643         }
08644         virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& /* _testGroupStats */ ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08645             currentGroupInfo.reset();
08646         }
08647         virtual void testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& /* _testRunStats */ ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08648             currentTestCaseInfo.reset();
08649             currentGroupInfo.reset();
08650             currentTestRunInfo.reset();
08651         }
08652 
08653         virtual void skipTest( TestCaseInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08654             // Don't do anything with this by default.
08655             // It can optionally be overridden in the derived class.
08656         }
08657 
08658         Ptr<IConfig const> m_config;
08659         std::ostream& stream;
08660 
08661         LazyStat<TestRunInfo> currentTestRunInfo;
08662         LazyStat<GroupInfo> currentGroupInfo;
08663         LazyStat<TestCaseInfo> currentTestCaseInfo;
08664 
08665         std::vector<SectionInfo> m_sectionStack;
08666         ReporterPreferences m_reporterPrefs;
08667     };
08668 
08669     struct CumulativeReporterBase : SharedImpl<IStreamingReporter> {
08670         template<typename T, typename ChildNodeT>
08671         struct Node : SharedImpl<> {
08672             explicit Node( T const& _value ) : value( _value ) {}
08673             virtual ~Node() {}
08674 
08675             typedef std::vector<Ptr<ChildNodeT> > ChildNodes;
08676             T value;
08677             ChildNodes children;
08678         };
08679         struct SectionNode : SharedImpl<> {
08680             explicit SectionNode( SectionStats const& _stats ) : stats( _stats ) {}
08681             virtual ~SectionNode();
08682 
08683             bool operator == ( SectionNode const& other ) const {
08684                 return stats.sectionInfo.lineInfo == other.stats.sectionInfo.lineInfo;
08685             }
08686             bool operator == ( Ptr<SectionNode> const& other ) const {
08687                 return operator==( *other );
08688             }
08689 
08690             SectionStats stats;
08691             typedef std::vector<Ptr<SectionNode> > ChildSections;
08692             typedef std::vector<AssertionStats> Assertions;
08693             ChildSections childSections;
08694             Assertions assertions;
08695             std::string stdOut;
08696             std::string stdErr;
08697         };
08698 
08699         struct BySectionInfo {
08700             BySectionInfo( SectionInfo const& other ) : m_other( other ) {}
08701             BySectionInfo( BySectionInfo const& other ) : m_other( other.m_other ) {}
08702             bool operator() ( Ptr<SectionNode> const& node ) const {
08703                 return node->stats.sectionInfo.lineInfo == m_other.lineInfo;
08704             }
08705         private:
08706             void operator=( BySectionInfo const& );
08707             SectionInfo const& m_other;
08708         };
08709 
08710         typedef Node<TestCaseStats, SectionNode> TestCaseNode;
08711         typedef Node<TestGroupStats, TestCaseNode> TestGroupNode;
08712         typedef Node<TestRunStats, TestGroupNode> TestRunNode;
08713 
08714         CumulativeReporterBase( ReporterConfig const& _config )
08715         :   m_config( _config.fullConfig() ),
08716             stream( _config.stream() )
08717         {
08718             m_reporterPrefs.shouldRedirectStdOut = false;
08719         }
08720         ~CumulativeReporterBase();
08721 
08722         virtual ReporterPreferences getPreferences() const CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08723             return m_reporterPrefs;
08724         }
08725 
08726         virtual void testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08727         virtual void testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08728 
08729         virtual void testCaseStarting( TestCaseInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08730 
08731         virtual void sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& sectionInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08732             SectionStats incompleteStats( sectionInfo, Counts(), 0, false );
08733             Ptr<SectionNode> node;
08734             if( m_sectionStack.empty() ) {
08735                 if( !m_rootSection )
08736                     m_rootSection = new SectionNode( incompleteStats );
08737                 node = m_rootSection;
08738             }
08739             else {
08740                 SectionNode& parentNode = *m_sectionStack.back();
08741                 SectionNode::ChildSections::const_iterator it =
08742                     std::find_if(   parentNode.childSections.begin(),
08743                                     parentNode.childSections.end(),
08744                                     BySectionInfo( sectionInfo ) );
08745                 if( it == parentNode.childSections.end() ) {
08746                     node = new SectionNode( incompleteStats );
08747                     parentNode.childSections.push_back( node );
08748                 }
08749                 else
08750                     node = *it;
08751             }
08752             m_sectionStack.push_back( node );
08753             m_deepestSection = node;
08754         }
08755 
08756         virtual void assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08757 
08758         virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08759             assert( !m_sectionStack.empty() );
08760             SectionNode& sectionNode = *m_sectionStack.back();
08761             sectionNode.assertions.push_back( assertionStats );
08762             return true;
08763         }
08764         virtual void sectionEnded( SectionStats const& sectionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08765             assert( !m_sectionStack.empty() );
08766             SectionNode& node = *m_sectionStack.back();
08767             node.stats = sectionStats;
08768             m_sectionStack.pop_back();
08769         }
08770         virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& testCaseStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08771             Ptr<TestCaseNode> node = new TestCaseNode( testCaseStats );
08772             assert( m_sectionStack.size() == 0 );
08773             node->children.push_back( m_rootSection );
08774             m_testCases.push_back( node );
08775             m_rootSection.reset();
08776 
08777             assert( m_deepestSection );
08778             m_deepestSection->stdOut = testCaseStats.stdOut;
08779             m_deepestSection->stdErr = testCaseStats.stdErr;
08780         }
08781         virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& testGroupStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08782             Ptr<TestGroupNode> node = new TestGroupNode( testGroupStats );
08783             node->children.swap( m_testCases );
08784             m_testGroups.push_back( node );
08785         }
08786         virtual void testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& testRunStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08787             Ptr<TestRunNode> node = new TestRunNode( testRunStats );
08788             node->children.swap( m_testGroups );
08789             m_testRuns.push_back( node );
08790             testRunEndedCumulative();
08791         }
08792         virtual void testRunEndedCumulative() = 0;
08793 
08794         virtual void skipTest( TestCaseInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08795 
08796         Ptr<IConfig const> m_config;
08797         std::ostream& stream;
08798         std::vector<AssertionStats> m_assertions;
08799         std::vector<std::vector<Ptr<SectionNode> > > m_sections;
08800         std::vector<Ptr<TestCaseNode> > m_testCases;
08801         std::vector<Ptr<TestGroupNode> > m_testGroups;
08802 
08803         std::vector<Ptr<TestRunNode> > m_testRuns;
08804 
08805         Ptr<SectionNode> m_rootSection;
08806         Ptr<SectionNode> m_deepestSection;
08807         std::vector<Ptr<SectionNode> > m_sectionStack;
08808         ReporterPreferences m_reporterPrefs;
08809 
08810     };
08811 
08812     template<char C>
08813     char const* getLineOfChars() {
08814         static char line[CATCH_CONFIG_CONSOLE_WIDTH] = {0};
08815         if( !*line ) {
08816             memset( line, C, CATCH_CONFIG_CONSOLE_WIDTH-1 );
08817             line[CATCH_CONFIG_CONSOLE_WIDTH-1] = 0;
08818         }
08819         return line;
08820     }
08821 
08822     struct TestEventListenerBase : StreamingReporterBase {
08823         TestEventListenerBase( ReporterConfig const& _config )
08824         :   StreamingReporterBase( _config )
08825         {}
08826 
08827         virtual void assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
08828         virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
08829             return false;
08830         }
08831     };
08832 
08833 } // end namespace Catch
08834 
08835 // #included from: ../internal/catch_reporter_registrars.hpp
08836 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_REGISTRARS_HPP_INCLUDED
08837 
08838 namespace Catch {
08839 
08840     template<typename T>
08841     class LegacyReporterRegistrar {
08842 
08843         class ReporterFactory : public IReporterFactory {
08844             virtual IStreamingReporter* create( ReporterConfig const& config ) const {
08845                 return new LegacyReporterAdapter( new T( config ) );
08846             }
08847 
08848             virtual std::string getDescription() const {
08849                 return T::getDescription();
08850             }
08851         };
08852 
08853     public:
08854 
08855         LegacyReporterRegistrar( std::string const& name ) {
08856             getMutableRegistryHub().registerReporter( name, new ReporterFactory() );
08857         }
08858     };
08859 
08860     template<typename T>
08861     class ReporterRegistrar {
08862 
08863         class ReporterFactory : public SharedImpl<IReporterFactory> {
08864 
08865             // *** Please Note ***:
08866             // - If you end up here looking at a compiler error because it's trying to register
08867             // your custom reporter class be aware that the native reporter interface has changed
08868             // to IStreamingReporter. The "legacy" interface, IReporter, is still supported via
08869             // an adapter. Just use REGISTER_LEGACY_REPORTER to take advantage of the adapter.
08870             // However please consider updating to the new interface as the old one is now
08871             // deprecated and will probably be removed quite soon!
08872             // Please contact me via github if you have any questions at all about this.
08873             // In fact, ideally, please contact me anyway to let me know you've hit this - as I have
08874             // no idea who is actually using custom reporters at all (possibly no-one!).
08875             // The new interface is designed to minimise exposure to interface changes in the future.
08876             virtual IStreamingReporter* create( ReporterConfig const& config ) const {
08877                 return new T( config );
08878             }
08879 
08880             virtual std::string getDescription() const {
08881                 return T::getDescription();
08882             }
08883         };
08884 
08885     public:
08886 
08887         ReporterRegistrar( std::string const& name ) {
08888             getMutableRegistryHub().registerReporter( name, new ReporterFactory() );
08889         }
08890     };
08891 
08892     template<typename T>
08893     class ListenerRegistrar {
08894 
08895         class ListenerFactory : public SharedImpl<IReporterFactory> {
08896 
08897             virtual IStreamingReporter* create( ReporterConfig const& config ) const {
08898                 return new T( config );
08899             }
08900             virtual std::string getDescription() const {
08901                 return "";
08902             }
08903         };
08904 
08905     public:
08906 
08907         ListenerRegistrar() {
08908             getMutableRegistryHub().registerListener( new ListenerFactory() );
08909         }
08910     };
08911 }
08912 
08913 #define INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_LEGACY_REPORTER( name, reporterType ) \
08914     namespace{ Catch::LegacyReporterRegistrar<reporterType> catch_internal_RegistrarFor##reporterType( name ); }
08915 
08916 #define INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_REPORTER( name, reporterType ) \
08917     namespace{ Catch::ReporterRegistrar<reporterType> catch_internal_RegistrarFor##reporterType( name ); }
08918 
08919 #define INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_LISTENER( listenerType ) \
08920     namespace{ Catch::ListenerRegistrar<listenerType> catch_internal_RegistrarFor##listenerType; }
08921 
08922 // #included from: ../internal/catch_xmlwriter.hpp
08923 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_XMLWRITER_HPP_INCLUDED
08924 
08925 #include <sstream>
08926 #include <string>
08927 #include <vector>
08928 #include <iomanip>
08929 
08930 namespace Catch {
08931 
08932     class XmlEncode {
08933     public:
08934         enum ForWhat { ForTextNodes, ForAttributes };
08935 
08936         XmlEncode( std::string const& str, ForWhat forWhat = ForTextNodes )
08937         :   m_str( str ),
08938             m_forWhat( forWhat )
08939         {}
08940 
08941         void encodeTo( std::ostream& os ) const {
08942 
08943             // Apostrophe escaping not necessary if we always use " to write attributes
08944             // (see: http://www.w3.org/TR/xml/#syntax)
08945 
08946             for( std::size_t i = 0; i < m_str.size(); ++ i ) {
08947                 char c = m_str[i];
08948                 switch( c ) {
08949                     case '<':   os << "&lt;"; break;
08950                     case '&':   os << "&amp;"; break;
08951 
08952                     case '>':
08953                         // See: http://www.w3.org/TR/xml/#syntax
08954                         if( i > 2 && m_str[i-1] == ']' && m_str[i-2] == ']' )
08955                             os << "&gt;";
08956                         else
08957                             os << c;
08958                         break;
08959 
08960                     case '\"':
08961                         if( m_forWhat == ForAttributes )
08962                             os << "&quot;";
08963                         else
08964                             os << c;
08965                         break;
08966 
08967                     default:
08968                         // Escape control chars - based on contribution by @espenalb in PR #465 and
08969                         // by @mrpi PR #588
08970                         if ( ( c < '\x09' ) || ( c > '\x0D' && c < '\x20') || c=='\x7F' )
08971                             os << "&#x" << std::uppercase << std::hex << std::setfill('0') << std::setw(2) << static_cast<int>( c ) << ';';
08972                         else
08973                             os << c;
08974                 }
08975             }
08976         }
08977 
08978         friend std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os, XmlEncode const& xmlEncode ) {
08979             xmlEncode.encodeTo( os );
08980             return os;
08981         }
08982 
08983     private:
08984         std::string m_str;
08985         ForWhat m_forWhat;
08986     };
08987 
08988     class XmlWriter {
08989     public:
08990 
08991         class ScopedElement {
08992         public:
08993             ScopedElement( XmlWriter* writer )
08994             :   m_writer( writer )
08995             {}
08996 
08997             ScopedElement( ScopedElement const& other )
08998             :   m_writer( other.m_writer ){
08999                 other.m_writer = CATCH_NULL;
09000             }
09001 
09002             ~ScopedElement() {
09003                 if( m_writer )
09004                     m_writer->endElement();
09005             }
09006 
09007             ScopedElement& writeText( std::string const& text, bool indent = true ) {
09008                 m_writer->writeText( text, indent );
09009                 return *this;
09010             }
09011 
09012             template<typename T>
09013             ScopedElement& writeAttribute( std::string const& name, T const& attribute ) {
09014                 m_writer->writeAttribute( name, attribute );
09015                 return *this;
09016             }
09017 
09018         private:
09019             mutable XmlWriter* m_writer;
09020         };
09021 
09022         XmlWriter()
09023         :   m_tagIsOpen( false ),
09024             m_needsNewline( false ),
09025             m_os( &Catch::cout() )
09026         {
09027             // We encode control characters, which requires
09028             // XML 1.1
09029             // see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/404107/why-are-control-characters-illegal-in-xml-1-0
09030             *m_os << "<?xml version=\"1.1\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n";
09031         }
09032 
09033         XmlWriter( std::ostream& os )
09034         :   m_tagIsOpen( false ),
09035             m_needsNewline( false ),
09036             m_os( &os )
09037         {
09038             *m_os << "<?xml version=\"1.1\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?>\n";
09039         }
09040 
09041         ~XmlWriter() {
09042             while( !m_tags.empty() )
09043                 endElement();
09044         }
09045 
09046         XmlWriter& startElement( std::string const& name ) {
09047             ensureTagClosed();
09048             newlineIfNecessary();
09049             stream() << m_indent << "<" << name;
09050             m_tags.push_back( name );
09051             m_indent += "  ";
09052             m_tagIsOpen = true;
09053             return *this;
09054         }
09055 
09056         ScopedElement scopedElement( std::string const& name ) {
09057             ScopedElement scoped( this );
09058             startElement( name );
09059             return scoped;
09060         }
09061 
09062         XmlWriter& endElement() {
09063             newlineIfNecessary();
09064             m_indent = m_indent.substr( 0, m_indent.size()-2 );
09065             if( m_tagIsOpen ) {
09066                 stream() << "/>\n";
09067                 m_tagIsOpen = false;
09068             }
09069             else {
09070                 stream() << m_indent << "</" << m_tags.back() << ">\n";
09071             }
09072             m_tags.pop_back();
09073             return *this;
09074         }
09075 
09076         XmlWriter& writeAttribute( std::string const& name, std::string const& attribute ) {
09077             if( !name.empty() && !attribute.empty() )
09078                 stream() << " " << name << "=\"" << XmlEncode( attribute, XmlEncode::ForAttributes ) << "\"";
09079             return *this;
09080         }
09081 
09082         XmlWriter& writeAttribute( std::string const& name, bool attribute ) {
09083             stream() << " " << name << "=\"" << ( attribute ? "true" : "false" ) << "\"";
09084             return *this;
09085         }
09086 
09087         template<typename T>
09088         XmlWriter& writeAttribute( std::string const& name, T const& attribute ) {
09089             std::ostringstream oss;
09090             oss << attribute;
09091             return writeAttribute( name, oss.str() );
09092         }
09093 
09094         XmlWriter& writeText( std::string const& text, bool indent = true ) {
09095             if( !text.empty() ){
09096                 bool tagWasOpen = m_tagIsOpen;
09097                 ensureTagClosed();
09098                 if( tagWasOpen && indent )
09099                     stream() << m_indent;
09100                 stream() << XmlEncode( text );
09101                 m_needsNewline = true;
09102             }
09103             return *this;
09104         }
09105 
09106         XmlWriter& writeComment( std::string const& text ) {
09107             ensureTagClosed();
09108             stream() << m_indent << "<!--" << text << "-->";
09109             m_needsNewline = true;
09110             return *this;
09111         }
09112 
09113         XmlWriter& writeBlankLine() {
09114             ensureTagClosed();
09115             stream() << "\n";
09116             return *this;
09117         }
09118 
09119         void setStream( std::ostream& os ) {
09120             m_os = &os;
09121         }
09122 
09123     private:
09124         XmlWriter( XmlWriter const& );
09125         void operator=( XmlWriter const& );
09126 
09127         std::ostream& stream() {
09128             return *m_os;
09129         }
09130 
09131         void ensureTagClosed() {
09132             if( m_tagIsOpen ) {
09133                 stream() << ">\n";
09134                 m_tagIsOpen = false;
09135             }
09136         }
09137 
09138         void newlineIfNecessary() {
09139             if( m_needsNewline ) {
09140                 stream() << "\n";
09141                 m_needsNewline = false;
09142             }
09143         }
09144 
09145         bool m_tagIsOpen;
09146         bool m_needsNewline;
09147         std::vector<std::string> m_tags;
09148         std::string m_indent;
09149         std::ostream* m_os;
09150     };
09151 
09152 }
09153 // #included from: catch_reenable_warnings.h
09154 
09155 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REENABLE_WARNINGS_H_INCLUDED
09156 
09157 #ifdef __clang__
09158 #    ifdef __ICC // icpc defines the __clang__ macro
09159 #        pragma warning(pop)
09160 #    else
09161 #        pragma clang diagnostic pop
09162 #    endif
09163 #elif defined __GNUC__
09164 #    pragma GCC diagnostic pop
09165 #endif
09166 
09167 
09168 namespace Catch {
09169     class XmlReporter : public StreamingReporterBase {
09170     public:
09171         XmlReporter( ReporterConfig const& _config )
09172         :   StreamingReporterBase( _config ),
09173             m_xml(_config.stream()),
09174             m_sectionDepth( 0 )
09175         {
09176             m_reporterPrefs.shouldRedirectStdOut = true;
09177         }
09178 
09179         virtual ~XmlReporter() CATCH_OVERRIDE;
09180 
09181         static std::string getDescription() {
09182             return "Reports test results as an XML document";
09183         }
09184 
09185     public: // StreamingReporterBase
09186 
09187         virtual void noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& s ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09188             StreamingReporterBase::noMatchingTestCases( s );
09189         }
09190 
09191         virtual void testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& testInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09192             StreamingReporterBase::testRunStarting( testInfo );
09193             m_xml.startElement( "Catch" );
09194             if( !m_config->name().empty() )
09195                 m_xml.writeAttribute( "name", m_config->name() );
09196         }
09197 
09198         virtual void testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& groupInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09199             StreamingReporterBase::testGroupStarting( groupInfo );
09200             m_xml.startElement( "Group" )
09201                 .writeAttribute( "name", groupInfo.name );
09202         }
09203 
09204         virtual void testCaseStarting( TestCaseInfo const& testInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09205             StreamingReporterBase::testCaseStarting(testInfo);
09206             m_xml.startElement( "TestCase" ).writeAttribute( "name", testInfo.name );
09207 
09208             if ( m_config->showDurations() == ShowDurations::Always )
09209                 m_testCaseTimer.start();
09210         }
09211 
09212         virtual void sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& sectionInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09213             StreamingReporterBase::sectionStarting( sectionInfo );
09214             if( m_sectionDepth++ > 0 ) {
09215                 m_xml.startElement( "Section" )
09216                     .writeAttribute( "name", trim( sectionInfo.name ) )
09217                     .writeAttribute( "description", sectionInfo.description );
09218             }
09219         }
09220 
09221         virtual void assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE { }
09222 
09223         virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09224             const AssertionResult& assertionResult = assertionStats.assertionResult;
09225 
09226             // Print any info messages in <Info> tags.
09227             if( assertionStats.assertionResult.getResultType() != ResultWas::Ok ) {
09228                 for( std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator it = assertionStats.infoMessages.begin(), itEnd = assertionStats.infoMessages.end();
09229                         it != itEnd;
09230                         ++it ) {
09231                     if( it->type == ResultWas::Info ) {
09232                         m_xml.scopedElement( "Info" )
09233                             .writeText( it->message );
09234                     } else if ( it->type == ResultWas::Warning ) {
09235                         m_xml.scopedElement( "Warning" )
09236                             .writeText( it->message );
09237                     }
09238                 }
09239             }
09240 
09241             // Drop out if result was successful but we're not printing them.
09242             if( !m_config->includeSuccessfulResults() && isOk(assertionResult.getResultType()) )
09243                 return true;
09244 
09245             // Print the expression if there is one.
09246             if( assertionResult.hasExpression() ) {
09247                 m_xml.startElement( "Expression" )
09248                     .writeAttribute( "success", assertionResult.succeeded() )
09249                     .writeAttribute( "type", assertionResult.getTestMacroName() )
09250                     .writeAttribute( "filename", assertionResult.getSourceInfo().file )
09251                     .writeAttribute( "line", assertionResult.getSourceInfo().line );
09252 
09253                 m_xml.scopedElement( "Original" )
09254                     .writeText( assertionResult.getExpression() );
09255                 m_xml.scopedElement( "Expanded" )
09256                     .writeText( assertionResult.getExpandedExpression() );
09257             }
09258 
09259             // And... Print a result applicable to each result type.
09260             switch( assertionResult.getResultType() ) {
09261                 case ResultWas::ThrewException:
09262                     m_xml.scopedElement( "Exception" )
09263                         .writeAttribute( "filename", assertionResult.getSourceInfo().file )
09264                         .writeAttribute( "line", assertionResult.getSourceInfo().line )
09265                         .writeText( assertionResult.getMessage() );
09266                     break;
09267                 case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
09268                     m_xml.scopedElement( "FatalErrorCondition" )
09269                         .writeAttribute( "filename", assertionResult.getSourceInfo().file )
09270                         .writeAttribute( "line", assertionResult.getSourceInfo().line )
09271                         .writeText( assertionResult.getMessage() );
09272                     break;
09273                 case ResultWas::Info:
09274                     m_xml.scopedElement( "Info" )
09275                         .writeText( assertionResult.getMessage() );
09276                     break;
09277                 case ResultWas::Warning:
09278                     // Warning will already have been written
09279                     break;
09280                 case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
09281                     m_xml.scopedElement( "Failure" )
09282                         .writeText( assertionResult.getMessage() );
09283                     break;
09284                 default:
09285                     break;
09286             }
09287 
09288             if( assertionResult.hasExpression() )
09289                 m_xml.endElement();
09290 
09291             return true;
09292         }
09293 
09294         virtual void sectionEnded( SectionStats const& sectionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09295             StreamingReporterBase::sectionEnded( sectionStats );
09296             if( --m_sectionDepth > 0 ) {
09297                 XmlWriter::ScopedElement e = m_xml.scopedElement( "OverallResults" );
09298                 e.writeAttribute( "successes", sectionStats.assertions.passed );
09299                 e.writeAttribute( "failures", sectionStats.assertions.failed );
09300                 e.writeAttribute( "expectedFailures", sectionStats.assertions.failedButOk );
09301 
09302                 if ( m_config->showDurations() == ShowDurations::Always )
09303                     e.writeAttribute( "durationInSeconds", sectionStats.durationInSeconds );
09304 
09305                 m_xml.endElement();
09306             }
09307         }
09308 
09309         virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& testCaseStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09310             StreamingReporterBase::testCaseEnded( testCaseStats );
09311             XmlWriter::ScopedElement e = m_xml.scopedElement( "OverallResult" );
09312             e.writeAttribute( "success", testCaseStats.totals.assertions.allOk() );
09313 
09314             if ( m_config->showDurations() == ShowDurations::Always )
09315                 e.writeAttribute( "durationInSeconds", m_testCaseTimer.getElapsedSeconds() );
09316 
09317             m_xml.endElement();
09318         }
09319 
09320         virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& testGroupStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09321             StreamingReporterBase::testGroupEnded( testGroupStats );
09322             // TODO: Check testGroupStats.aborting and act accordingly.
09323             m_xml.scopedElement( "OverallResults" )
09324                 .writeAttribute( "successes", testGroupStats.totals.assertions.passed )
09325                 .writeAttribute( "failures", testGroupStats.totals.assertions.failed )
09326                 .writeAttribute( "expectedFailures", testGroupStats.totals.assertions.failedButOk );
09327             m_xml.endElement();
09328         }
09329 
09330         virtual void testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& testRunStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09331             StreamingReporterBase::testRunEnded( testRunStats );
09332             m_xml.scopedElement( "OverallResults" )
09333                 .writeAttribute( "successes", testRunStats.totals.assertions.passed )
09334                 .writeAttribute( "failures", testRunStats.totals.assertions.failed )
09335                 .writeAttribute( "expectedFailures", testRunStats.totals.assertions.failedButOk );
09336             m_xml.endElement();
09337         }
09338 
09339     private:
09340         Timer m_testCaseTimer;
09341         XmlWriter m_xml;
09342         int m_sectionDepth;
09343     };
09344 
09345      INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_REPORTER( "xml", XmlReporter )
09346 
09347 } // end namespace Catch
09348 
09349 // #included from: ../reporters/catch_reporter_junit.hpp
09350 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_JUNIT_HPP_INCLUDED
09351 
09352 #include <assert.h>
09353 
09354 namespace Catch {
09355 
09356     class JunitReporter : public CumulativeReporterBase {
09357     public:
09358         JunitReporter( ReporterConfig const& _config )
09359         :   CumulativeReporterBase( _config ),
09360             xml( _config.stream() )
09361         {
09362             m_reporterPrefs.shouldRedirectStdOut = true;
09363         }
09364 
09365         virtual ~JunitReporter() CATCH_OVERRIDE;
09366 
09367         static std::string getDescription() {
09368             return "Reports test results in an XML format that looks like Ant's junitreport target";
09369         }
09370 
09371         virtual void noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& /*spec*/ ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {}
09372 
09373         virtual void testRunStarting( TestRunInfo const& runInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09374             CumulativeReporterBase::testRunStarting( runInfo );
09375             xml.startElement( "testsuites" );
09376         }
09377 
09378         virtual void testGroupStarting( GroupInfo const& groupInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09379             suiteTimer.start();
09380             stdOutForSuite.str("");
09381             stdErrForSuite.str("");
09382             unexpectedExceptions = 0;
09383             CumulativeReporterBase::testGroupStarting( groupInfo );
09384         }
09385 
09386         virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& assertionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09387             if( assertionStats.assertionResult.getResultType() == ResultWas::ThrewException )
09388                 unexpectedExceptions++;
09389             return CumulativeReporterBase::assertionEnded( assertionStats );
09390         }
09391 
09392         virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& testCaseStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09393             stdOutForSuite << testCaseStats.stdOut;
09394             stdErrForSuite << testCaseStats.stdErr;
09395             CumulativeReporterBase::testCaseEnded( testCaseStats );
09396         }
09397 
09398         virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& testGroupStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09399             double suiteTime = suiteTimer.getElapsedSeconds();
09400             CumulativeReporterBase::testGroupEnded( testGroupStats );
09401             writeGroup( *m_testGroups.back(), suiteTime );
09402         }
09403 
09404         virtual void testRunEndedCumulative() CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09405             xml.endElement();
09406         }
09407 
09408         void writeGroup( TestGroupNode const& groupNode, double suiteTime ) {
09409             XmlWriter::ScopedElement e = xml.scopedElement( "testsuite" );
09410             TestGroupStats const& stats = groupNode.value;
09411             xml.writeAttribute( "name", stats.groupInfo.name );
09412             xml.writeAttribute( "errors", unexpectedExceptions );
09413             xml.writeAttribute( "failures", stats.totals.assertions.failed-unexpectedExceptions );
09414             xml.writeAttribute( "tests", stats.totals.assertions.total() );
09415             xml.writeAttribute( "hostname", "tbd" ); // !TBD
09416             if( m_config->showDurations() == ShowDurations::Never )
09417                 xml.writeAttribute( "time", "" );
09418             else
09419                 xml.writeAttribute( "time", suiteTime );
09420             xml.writeAttribute( "timestamp", "tbd" ); // !TBD
09421 
09422             // Write test cases
09423             for( TestGroupNode::ChildNodes::const_iterator
09424                     it = groupNode.children.begin(), itEnd = groupNode.children.end();
09425                     it != itEnd;
09426                     ++it )
09427                 writeTestCase( **it );
09428 
09429             xml.scopedElement( "system-out" ).writeText( trim( stdOutForSuite.str() ), false );
09430             xml.scopedElement( "system-err" ).writeText( trim( stdErrForSuite.str() ), false );
09431         }
09432 
09433         void writeTestCase( TestCaseNode const& testCaseNode ) {
09434             TestCaseStats const& stats = testCaseNode.value;
09435 
09436             // All test cases have exactly one section - which represents the
09437             // test case itself. That section may have 0-n nested sections
09438             assert( testCaseNode.children.size() == 1 );
09439             SectionNode const& rootSection = *testCaseNode.children.front();
09440 
09441             std::string className = stats.testInfo.className;
09442 
09443             if( className.empty() ) {
09444                 if( rootSection.childSections.empty() )
09445                     className = "global";
09446             }
09447             writeSection( className, "", rootSection );
09448         }
09449 
09450         void writeSection(  std::string const& className,
09451                             std::string const& rootName,
09452                             SectionNode const& sectionNode ) {
09453             std::string name = trim( sectionNode.stats.sectionInfo.name );
09454             if( !rootName.empty() )
09455                 name = rootName + "/" + name;
09456 
09457             if( !sectionNode.assertions.empty() ||
09458                 !sectionNode.stdOut.empty() ||
09459                 !sectionNode.stdErr.empty() ) {
09460                 XmlWriter::ScopedElement e = xml.scopedElement( "testcase" );
09461                 if( className.empty() ) {
09462                     xml.writeAttribute( "classname", name );
09463                     xml.writeAttribute( "name", "root" );
09464                 }
09465                 else {
09466                     xml.writeAttribute( "classname", className );
09467                     xml.writeAttribute( "name", name );
09468                 }
09469                 xml.writeAttribute( "time", Catch::toString( sectionNode.stats.durationInSeconds ) );
09470 
09471                 writeAssertions( sectionNode );
09472 
09473                 if( !sectionNode.stdOut.empty() )
09474                     xml.scopedElement( "system-out" ).writeText( trim( sectionNode.stdOut ), false );
09475                 if( !sectionNode.stdErr.empty() )
09476                     xml.scopedElement( "system-err" ).writeText( trim( sectionNode.stdErr ), false );
09477             }
09478             for( SectionNode::ChildSections::const_iterator
09479                     it = sectionNode.childSections.begin(),
09480                     itEnd = sectionNode.childSections.end();
09481                     it != itEnd;
09482                     ++it )
09483                 if( className.empty() )
09484                     writeSection( name, "", **it );
09485                 else
09486                     writeSection( className, name, **it );
09487         }
09488 
09489         void writeAssertions( SectionNode const& sectionNode ) {
09490             for( SectionNode::Assertions::const_iterator
09491                     it = sectionNode.assertions.begin(), itEnd = sectionNode.assertions.end();
09492                     it != itEnd;
09493                     ++it )
09494                 writeAssertion( *it );
09495         }
09496         void writeAssertion( AssertionStats const& stats ) {
09497             AssertionResult const& result = stats.assertionResult;
09498             if( !result.isOk() ) {
09499                 std::string elementName;
09500                 switch( result.getResultType() ) {
09501                     case ResultWas::ThrewException:
09502                     case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
09503                         elementName = "error";
09504                         break;
09505                     case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
09506                         elementName = "failure";
09507                         break;
09508                     case ResultWas::ExpressionFailed:
09509                         elementName = "failure";
09510                         break;
09511                     case ResultWas::DidntThrowException:
09512                         elementName = "failure";
09513                         break;
09514 
09515                     // We should never see these here:
09516                     case ResultWas::Info:
09517                     case ResultWas::Warning:
09518                     case ResultWas::Ok:
09519                     case ResultWas::Unknown:
09520                     case ResultWas::FailureBit:
09521                     case ResultWas::Exception:
09522                         elementName = "internalError";
09523                         break;
09524                 }
09525 
09526                 XmlWriter::ScopedElement e = xml.scopedElement( elementName );
09527 
09528                 xml.writeAttribute( "message", result.getExpandedExpression() );
09529                 xml.writeAttribute( "type", result.getTestMacroName() );
09530 
09531                 std::ostringstream oss;
09532                 if( !result.getMessage().empty() )
09533                     oss << result.getMessage() << "\n";
09534                 for( std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator
09535                         it = stats.infoMessages.begin(),
09536                         itEnd = stats.infoMessages.end();
09537                             it != itEnd;
09538                             ++it )
09539                     if( it->type == ResultWas::Info )
09540                         oss << it->message << "\n";
09541 
09542                 oss << "at " << result.getSourceInfo();
09543                 xml.writeText( oss.str(), false );
09544             }
09545         }
09546 
09547         XmlWriter xml;
09548         Timer suiteTimer;
09549         std::ostringstream stdOutForSuite;
09550         std::ostringstream stdErrForSuite;
09551         unsigned int unexpectedExceptions;
09552     };
09553 
09554     INTERNAL_CATCH_REGISTER_REPORTER( "junit", JunitReporter )
09555 
09556 } // end namespace Catch
09557 
09558 // #included from: ../reporters/catch_reporter_console.hpp
09559 #define TWOBLUECUBES_CATCH_REPORTER_CONSOLE_HPP_INCLUDED
09560 
09561 namespace Catch {
09562 
09563     struct ConsoleReporter : StreamingReporterBase {
09564         ConsoleReporter( ReporterConfig const& _config )
09565         :   StreamingReporterBase( _config ),
09566             m_headerPrinted( false )
09567         {}
09568 
09569         virtual ~ConsoleReporter() CATCH_OVERRIDE;
09570         static std::string getDescription() {
09571             return "Reports test results as plain lines of text";
09572         }
09573 
09574         virtual void noMatchingTestCases( std::string const& spec ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09575             stream << "No test cases matched '" << spec << "'" << std::endl;
09576         }
09577 
09578         virtual void assertionStarting( AssertionInfo const& ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09579         }
09580 
09581         virtual bool assertionEnded( AssertionStats const& _assertionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09582             AssertionResult const& result = _assertionStats.assertionResult;
09583 
09584             bool printInfoMessages = true;
09585 
09586             // Drop out if result was successful and we're not printing those
09587             if( !m_config->includeSuccessfulResults() && result.isOk() ) {
09588                 if( result.getResultType() != ResultWas::Warning )
09589                     return false;
09590                 printInfoMessages = false;
09591             }
09592 
09593             lazyPrint();
09594 
09595             AssertionPrinter printer( stream, _assertionStats, printInfoMessages );
09596             printer.print();
09597             stream << std::endl;
09598             return true;
09599         }
09600 
09601         virtual void sectionStarting( SectionInfo const& _sectionInfo ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09602             m_headerPrinted = false;
09603             StreamingReporterBase::sectionStarting( _sectionInfo );
09604         }
09605         virtual void sectionEnded( SectionStats const& _sectionStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09606             if( _sectionStats.missingAssertions ) {
09607                 lazyPrint();
09608                 Colour colour( Colour::ResultError );
09609                 if( m_sectionStack.size() > 1 )
09610                     stream << "\nNo assertions in section";
09611                 else
09612                     stream << "\nNo assertions in test case";
09613                 stream << " '" << _sectionStats.sectionInfo.name << "'\n" << std::endl;
09614             }
09615             if( m_headerPrinted ) {
09616                 if( m_config->showDurations() == ShowDurations::Always )
09617                     stream << "Completed in " << _sectionStats.durationInSeconds << "s" << std::endl;
09618                 m_headerPrinted = false;
09619             }
09620             else {
09621                 if( m_config->showDurations() == ShowDurations::Always )
09622                     stream << _sectionStats.sectionInfo.name << " completed in " << _sectionStats.durationInSeconds << "s" << std::endl;
09623             }
09624             StreamingReporterBase::sectionEnded( _sectionStats );
09625         }
09626 
09627         virtual void testCaseEnded( TestCaseStats const& _testCaseStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09628             StreamingReporterBase::testCaseEnded( _testCaseStats );
09629             m_headerPrinted = false;
09630         }
09631         virtual void testGroupEnded( TestGroupStats const& _testGroupStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09632             if( currentGroupInfo.used ) {
09633                 printSummaryDivider();
09634                 stream << "Summary for group '" << _testGroupStats.groupInfo.name << "':\n";
09635                 printTotals( _testGroupStats.totals );
09636                 stream << "\n" << std::endl;
09637             }
09638             StreamingReporterBase::testGroupEnded( _testGroupStats );
09639         }
09640         virtual void testRunEnded( TestRunStats const& _testRunStats ) CATCH_OVERRIDE {
09641             printTotalsDivider( _testRunStats.totals );
09642             printTotals( _testRunStats.totals );
09643             stream << std::endl;
09644             StreamingReporterBase::testRunEnded( _testRunStats );
09645         }
09646 
09647     private:
09648 
09649         class AssertionPrinter {
09650             void operator= ( AssertionPrinter const& );
09651         public:
09652             AssertionPrinter( std::ostream& _stream, AssertionStats const& _stats, bool _printInfoMessages )
09653             :   stream( _stream ),
09654                 stats( _stats ),
09655                 result( _stats.assertionResult ),
09656                 colour( Colour::None ),
09657                 message( result.getMessage() ),
09658                 messages( _stats.infoMessages ),
09659                 printInfoMessages( _printInfoMessages )
09660             {
09661                 switch( result.getResultType() ) {
09662                     case ResultWas::Ok:
09663                         colour = Colour::Success;
09664                         passOrFail = "PASSED";
09665                         //if( result.hasMessage() )
09666                         if( _stats.infoMessages.size() == 1 )
09667                             messageLabel = "with message";
09668                         if( _stats.infoMessages.size() > 1 )
09669                             messageLabel = "with messages";
09670                         break;
09671                     case ResultWas::ExpressionFailed:
09672                         if( result.isOk() ) {
09673                             colour = Colour::Success;
09674                             passOrFail = "FAILED - but was ok";
09675                         }
09676                         else {
09677                             colour = Colour::Error;
09678                             passOrFail = "FAILED";
09679                         }
09680                         if( _stats.infoMessages.size() == 1 )
09681                             messageLabel = "with message";
09682                         if( _stats.infoMessages.size() > 1 )
09683                             messageLabel = "with messages";
09684                         break;
09685                     case ResultWas::ThrewException:
09686                         colour = Colour::Error;
09687                         passOrFail = "FAILED";
09688                         messageLabel = "due to unexpected exception with message";
09689                         break;
09690                     case ResultWas::FatalErrorCondition:
09691                         colour = Colour::Error;
09692                         passOrFail = "FAILED";
09693                         messageLabel = "due to a fatal error condition";
09694                         break;
09695                     case ResultWas::DidntThrowException:
09696                         colour = Colour::Error;
09697                         passOrFail = "FAILED";
09698                         messageLabel = "because no exception was thrown where one was expected";
09699                         break;
09700                     case ResultWas::Info:
09701                         messageLabel = "info";
09702                         break;
09703                     case ResultWas::Warning:
09704                         messageLabel = "warning";
09705                         break;
09706                     case ResultWas::ExplicitFailure:
09707                         passOrFail = "FAILED";
09708                         colour = Colour::Error;
09709                         if( _stats.infoMessages.size() == 1 )
09710                             messageLabel = "explicitly with message";
09711                         if( _stats.infoMessages.size() > 1 )
09712                             messageLabel = "explicitly with messages";
09713                         break;
09714                     // These cases are here to prevent compiler warnings
09715                     case ResultWas::Unknown:
09716                     case ResultWas::FailureBit:
09717                     case ResultWas::Exception:
09718                         passOrFail = "** internal error **";
09719                         colour = Colour::Error;
09720                         break;
09721                 }
09722             }
09723 
09724             void print() const {
09725                 printSourceInfo();
09726                 if( stats.totals.assertions.total() > 0 ) {
09727                     if( result.isOk() )
09728                         stream << "\n";
09729                     printResultType();
09730                     printOriginalExpression();
09731                     printReconstructedExpression();
09732                 }
09733                 else {
09734                     stream << "\n";
09735                 }
09736                 printMessage();
09737             }
09738 
09739         private:
09740             void printResultType() const {
09741                 if( !passOrFail.empty() ) {
09742                     Colour colourGuard( colour );
09743                     stream << passOrFail << ":\n";
09744                 }
09745             }
09746             void printOriginalExpression() const {
09747                 if( result.hasExpression() ) {
09748                     Colour colourGuard( Colour::OriginalExpression );
09749                     stream  << "  ";
09750                     stream << result.getExpressionInMacro();
09751                     stream << "\n";
09752                 }
09753             }
09754             void printReconstructedExpression() const {
09755                 if( result.hasExpandedExpression() ) {
09756                     stream << "with expansion:\n";
09757                     Colour colourGuard( Colour::ReconstructedExpression );
09758                     stream << Text( result.getExpandedExpression(), TextAttributes().setIndent(2) ) << "\n";
09759                 }
09760             }
09761             void printMessage() const {
09762                 if( !messageLabel.empty() )
09763                     stream << messageLabel << ":" << "\n";
09764                 for( std::vector<MessageInfo>::const_iterator it = messages.begin(), itEnd = messages.end();
09765                         it != itEnd;
09766                         ++it ) {
09767                     // If this assertion is a warning ignore any INFO messages
09768                     if( printInfoMessages || it->type != ResultWas::Info )
09769                         stream << Text( it->message, TextAttributes().setIndent(2) ) << "\n";
09770                 }
09771             }
09772             void printSourceInfo() const {
09773                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::FileName );
09774                 stream << result.getSourceInfo() << ": ";
09775             }
09776 
09777             std::ostream& stream;
09778             AssertionStats const& stats;
09779             AssertionResult const& result;
09780             Colour::Code colour;
09781             std::string passOrFail;
09782             std::string messageLabel;
09783             std::string message;
09784             std::vector<MessageInfo> messages;
09785             bool printInfoMessages;
09786         };
09787 
09788         void lazyPrint() {
09789 
09790             if( !currentTestRunInfo.used )
09791                 lazyPrintRunInfo();
09792             if( !currentGroupInfo.used )
09793                 lazyPrintGroupInfo();
09794 
09795             if( !m_headerPrinted ) {
09796                 printTestCaseAndSectionHeader();
09797                 m_headerPrinted = true;
09798             }
09799         }
09800         void lazyPrintRunInfo() {
09801             stream  << "\n" << getLineOfChars<'~'>() << "\n";
09802             Colour colour( Colour::SecondaryText );
09803             stream  << currentTestRunInfo->name
09804                     << " is a Catch v"  << libraryVersion << " host application.\n"
09805                     << "Run with -? for options\n\n";
09806 
09807             if( m_config->rngSeed() != 0 )
09808                 stream << "Randomness seeded to: " << m_config->rngSeed() << "\n\n";
09809 
09810             currentTestRunInfo.used = true;
09811         }
09812         void lazyPrintGroupInfo() {
09813             if( !currentGroupInfo->name.empty() && currentGroupInfo->groupsCounts > 1 ) {
09814                 printClosedHeader( "Group: " + currentGroupInfo->name );
09815                 currentGroupInfo.used = true;
09816             }
09817         }
09818         void printTestCaseAndSectionHeader() {
09819             assert( !m_sectionStack.empty() );
09820             printOpenHeader( currentTestCaseInfo->name );
09821 
09822             if( m_sectionStack.size() > 1 ) {
09823                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::Headers );
09824 
09825                 std::vector<SectionInfo>::const_iterator
09826                     it = m_sectionStack.begin()+1, // Skip first section (test case)
09827                     itEnd = m_sectionStack.end();
09828                 for( ; it != itEnd; ++it )
09829                     printHeaderString( it->name, 2 );
09830             }
09831 
09832             SourceLineInfo lineInfo = m_sectionStack.front().lineInfo;
09833 
09834             if( !lineInfo.empty() ){
09835                 stream << getLineOfChars<'-'>() << "\n";
09836                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::FileName );
09837                 stream << lineInfo << "\n";
09838             }
09839             stream << getLineOfChars<'.'>() << "\n" << std::endl;
09840         }
09841 
09842         void printClosedHeader( std::string const& _name ) {
09843             printOpenHeader( _name );
09844             stream << getLineOfChars<'.'>() << "\n";
09845         }
09846         void printOpenHeader( std::string const& _name ) {
09847             stream  << getLineOfChars<'-'>() << "\n";
09848             {
09849                 Colour colourGuard( Colour::Headers );
09850                 printHeaderString( _name );
09851             }
09852         }
09853 
09854         // if string has a : in first line will set indent to follow it on
09855         // subsequent lines
09856         void printHeaderString( std::string const& _string, std::size_t indent = 0 ) {
09857             std::size_t i = _string.find( ": " );
09858             if( i != std::string::npos )
09859                 i+=2;
09860             else
09861                 i = 0;
09862             stream << Text( _string, TextAttributes()
09863                                         .setIndent( indent+i)
09864                                         .setInitialIndent( indent ) ) << "\n";
09865         }
09866 
09867         struct SummaryColumn {
09868 
09869             SummaryColumn( std::string const& _label, Colour::Code _colour )
09870             :   label( _label ),
09871                 colour( _colour )
09872             {}
09873             SummaryColumn addRow( std::size_t count ) {
09874                 std::ostringstream oss;
09875                 oss << count;
09876                 std::string row = oss.str();
09877                 for( std::vector<std::string>::iterator it = rows.begin(); it != rows.end(); ++it ) {
09878                     while( it->size() < row.size() )
09879                         *it = " " + *it;
09880                     while( it->size() > row.size() )
09881                         row = " " + row;
09882                 }
09883                 rows.push_back( row );
09884                 return *this;
09885             }
09886 
09887             std::string label;
09888             Colour::Code colour;
09889             std::vector<std::string> rows;
09890 
09891         };
09892 
09893         void printTotals( Totals const& totals ) {
09894             if( totals.testCases.total() == 0 ) {
09895                 stream << Colour( Colour::Warning ) << "No tests ran\n";
09896             }
09897             else if( totals.assertions.total() > 0 && totals.testCases.allPassed() ) {
09898                 stream << Colour( Colour::ResultSuccess ) << "All tests passed";
09899                 stream << " ("
09900                         << pluralise( totals.assertions.passed, "assertion" ) << " in "
09901                         << pluralise( totals.testCases.passed, "test case" ) << ")"
09902                         << "\n";
09903             }
09904             else {
09905 
09906                 std::vector<SummaryColumn> columns;
09907                 columns.push_back( SummaryColumn( "", Colour::None )
09908                                         .addRow( totals.testCases.total() )
09909                                         .addRow( totals.assertions.total() ) );
09910                 columns.push_back( SummaryColumn( "passed", Colour::Success )
09911                                         .addRow( totals.testCases.passed )
09912                                         .addRow( totals.assertions.passed ) );
09913                 columns.push_back( SummaryColumn( "failed", Colour::ResultError )
09914                                         .addRow( totals.testCases.failed )
09915                                         .addRow( totals.assertions.failed ) );
09916                 columns.push_back( SummaryColumn( "failed as expected", Colour::ResultExpectedFailure )
09917                                         .addRow( totals.testCases.failedButOk )
09918                                         .addRow( totals.assertions.failedButOk ) );
09919 
09920                 printSummaryRow( "test cases", columns, 0 );
09921                 printSummaryRow( "assertions", columns, 1 );
09922             }
09923         }
09924         void printSummaryRow( std::string const& label, std::vector<SummaryColumn> const& cols, std::size_t row ) {
09925             for( std::vector<SummaryColumn>::const_iterator it = cols.begin(); it != cols.end(); ++it ) {
09926                 std::string value = it->rows[row];
09927                 if( it->label.empty() ) {
09928                     stream << label << ": ";
09929                     if( value != "0" )
09930                         stream << value;
09931                     else
09932                         stream << Colour( Colour::Warning ) << "- none -";
09933                 }
09934                 else if( value != "0" ) {
09935                     stream  << Colour( Colour::LightGrey ) << " | ";
09936                     stream  << Colour( it->colour )
09937                             << value << " " << it->label;
09938                 }
09939             }
09940             stream << "\n";
09941         }
09942 
09943         static std::size_t makeRatio( std::size_t number, std::size_t total ) {
09944             std::size_t ratio = total > 0 ? CATCH_CONFIG_CONSOLE_WIDTH * number/ total : 0;
09945             return ( ratio == 0 && number > 0 ) ? 1 : ratio;
09946         }
09947         static std::size_t& findMax( std::size_t& i, std::size_t& j, std::size_t& k ) {
09948             if( i > j && i > k )
09949                 return i;
09950             else if( j > k )
09951                 return j;
09952             else
